Comparative Analysis of Online Visual Merchandising Practices Between Government and Private Indian Online Retailers, 7(6) Global Journal for Research Analysis 486 (2018).; https:\/\/www.bricslawjournal.com\/jour\/article\/view\/335; doi:10.21684\/2412-2343-2020-7-2-118-147","identifier":"https:\/\/www.bricslawjournal.com\/jour\/article\/view\/335; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.21684\/2412-2343-2020-7-2-118-147","title":"The Protection of Consumer Rights in the Digital Economy Conditions \u2013 the Experience of the BRICS Countries","paper_abstract":"Online contracts are characterized by unequal economic opportunities. The consumer, traditionally, has fewer economic opportunities, the seller \u2013 more. Digitalization of consumer-seller relations did not solve the old problem of insufficient consumer protection, but rather exacerbated it. Now the consumer needs to be protected from unscrupulous actions of both the seller and the aggregator of the information on goods, works, and services, i.e. the owner of the site on which the consumer buys the good, orders the work or the service. Acontract concluded on a site is a special type of adhesion contract. If a site sells goods from different sellers (which often happens), the terms and conditions of the adhesion contract are determined not only by the seller, but also by the site owner. Thus, the economically weak party \u2013 the consumer, needs to be protected both against the seller\u2019s abuse, and against the site owner\u2019s abuse. The article compares the experience of regulating the relations between the consumer, the seller (contractor) and the information aggregator accumulated by the EU countries, on the one hand, and BRICS countries, on the other. It is concluded that the development of regulation in all the BRICS countries is currently moving towards providing the consumer with the widest information opportunities. It is necessary to support the idea of holding the e-commerce aggregator responsible for any failure to fulfill its obligations to the consumer. The responsibility is considered acceptable when the aggregator has not informed the consumer that it does not provide goods, work, services, or in cases of the aggregator\u2019s gross negligence in identifying the user when registering a potential seller on the site. A separate problem is the public legal status of the online platform aggregator, since when an onsite contract is concluded, the consumer should not receive less secure goods than when a contract is concluded through an exchange of documents in the ordinary \u201cpaper\u201d form.","published_in":"BRICS Law Journal; Vol 7, No 2 (2020); 118-147 ; \u042e\u0440\u0438\u0434\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0436\u0443\u0440\u043d\u0430\u043b \u0411\u0420\u0418\u041a\u0421; Vol 7, No 2 (2020); 118-147 ; 2412-2343 ; 2409-9058 ; 10.21684\/2412-2343-2020-7-2","year":"2020-05-23","subject_orig":"BRICS; digital law; digitalization of law; digital economy; online trading; protection of consumer rights; civil law; comparative law; law digital environments","subject":"BRICS; digital law; digitalization of law; digital economy; online trading; protection of consumer rights; civil law; comparative law; law digital environments","authors":"E. Ostanina; E. Titova","link":"https:\/\/www.bricslawjournal.com\/jour\/article\/view\/335","oa_state":"1","url":"e976fe7a7ec3e83924622860905c3837ec8e5ace16ed6342e422924f3d0cc62a","relevance":39},{"id":"4b06ebed139a1832002ea7812d7aff4a8da55181df1ea1a7811aee8b6ca7ea24","relation":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236262","identifier":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236262; https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/file\/343241","title":"DIGITALNI INFORMACIJSKI SUSTAVI I POSLOVNA INTELIGENCIJA TURISTI\u010cKE DESTINACIJE \u2013 PRIMJER eVisitor ; DIGITAL INFORMATION SYSTEMS AND BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE OF TOURIST DESTINATION - EXAMPLE eVisitor","paper_abstract":"Ovaj rad je usmjeren na podru\u010dje pra\u0107enja \u2013 monitoringa razvoja turisti\u010dke destinacije i kao svrhu ima ispitati do koje mjere su na me\u0111unarodnoj razini razvijeni digitalni informacijski sustavi u turizmu destinacije, kao i prikazati prve rezultate implementacije inovativnog projekta eVisitor, kao sustava pra\u0107enja turisti\u010dkih tijekova u Republici Hrvatskoj. U radu se, pored kra\u0107eg teoretskog okvira, donose i preporuke i smjernice relevantnih turisti\u010dkih organizacija i udru\u017eenja na me\u0111unarodnoj razini, uz prikaz nekoliko uspje\u0161nih regionalnih, nacionalnih i prekograni\u010dnih projekata usmjerenih ka izgradnji integriranih sustava pra\u0107enja razvoja turisti\u010dke destinacije. Osim toga, u radu se opisuje sustav eVisitor i ispituju se prva iskustva korisnika tog sustava. Rad se zaklju\u010duje preporukama i smjernicama za daljnji razvoj informacijskih upravlja\u010dkih sustava u kontekstu odr\u017eivog razvoja turisti\u010dkih destinacija. ; This paper focuses on the area of monitoring the development of tourist destination and aims to examine to what extent international digital information systems are developed in tourism destinations, as well as to show the first results of implementation of innovative project eVisitor, as a system for monitoring tourism flows in the Republic of Croatia. The paper, in addition to a brief theoretical framework, also presents recommendations and guidelines of relevant tourist organizations and associations at the international level, with the presentation of several successful regional, national and cross-border projects aimed at building integrated systems for monitoring the development of tourist destinations. In addition, the paper describes the eVisitor system and examines the first experiences of the user of the system. The paper concludes with recommendations and guidelines for the further development of information management systems in the context of sustainable development of tourist destinations.","published_in":"CroDiM : International Journal of Marketing Science ; ISSN 2584-7236 (Online) ; Volume 3 ; Issue 1","year":"2020","subject_orig":"menad\u017ement turisti\u010dke destinacije; poslovna inteligencija turisti\u010dke destinacije; informacijski sustavi u turizmu; eVisitor; odr\u017eivi razvoj turizma; tourism destination management; business intelligence of tourism destination; information systems in tourism; sustainable development of tourism","subject":"menad\u017ement turisti\u010dke destinacije; poslovna inteligencija turisti\u010dke destinacije; informacijski sustavi u turizmu; eVisitor; odr\u017eivi razvoj turizma; tourism destination management; business intelligence of tourism destination; information systems in tourism; sustainable development of tourism","authors":"Krajnovi\u0107, Aleksandra; Jeli\u010di\u0107, Nives; \u0160\u0107iran-Rizner, Marina","link":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236262","oa_state":"1","url":"4b06ebed139a1832002ea7812d7aff4a8da55181df1ea1a7811aee8b6ca7ea24","relevance":38},{"id":"22dd240daeea3f3b51b87b25caecfccc31e7826abc60b87421d312b712b32aa1","relation":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236265","identifier":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236265; https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/file\/343246","title":"INFLUENCER MARKETING KAO NA\u010cIN PROMOCIJE BRENDA PUTEM DRU\u0160TVENIH MRE\u017dA ; INFLUENCER MARKETING AS A WAY OF PROMOTING A BRAND VIA SOCIAL NETWORKS","paper_abstract":"Suvremeno tr\u017ei\u0161no okru\u017eenje kristalizira novu generaciju potro\u0161a\u010da kojoj organizacije u svojim komunikacijskim aktivnostima moraju slu\u017eiti. Jedna od novih mogu\u0107nosti sa zna\u010dajnim potencijalom u domeni suvremene marketin\u0161ke komunikacije podrazumijeva kori\u0161tenje \u201einfluencera\u201c, kao utjecjanih osoba na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama. Influencer marketing se usvaja kao suvremeni koncept koji predstavlja sve zna\u010dajniji oblik promocije na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama, a nastao je kao rezultat razvoja inoviranih strategija digitalnog marketinga. Primjenom dvostupanjskog komunikacijskog tijeka konkretnoj ciljnoj grupi pristupa se na poseban na\u010din kojim se stvara specifi\u010dan odnos izme\u0111u brendova, influencera i krajnjih korisnika, \u0161to u kona\u010dnici osigurava bolje pozicioniranje brenda i rast prodaje. U radu se utvr\u0111uju sli\u010dnosti i razlike izme\u0111u marketinga u online i offline okru\u017eenju, te, istra\u017eivanjima, na uzorku koji su \u010dinili predstavnici poslovnih subjekata i korisnika dru\u0161tvenih mre\u017ea iz Bosne i Hercegovine, Hrvatske i Srbije, analiziraju specifi\u010dnosti influencer marketinga i uspore\u0111uju sa rezultatima prethodno provedenih globalnih istra\u017eivanja. ; The contemporary market environment gives rise to a new generation of consumers to which the organisations, through their communication activities, must serve. One of the new possibilities with a high potential in the contemporary marketing communication domain, entails the use of \u201cinfluencers\u201d, i.e. influential individuals, on social networks. Influencer marketing is being welcomed as a modern concept which represents the more and more significant way of promoting brands on social networks, and which emerged as a result of the development of the innovative digital marketing strategies. By applying the two-phase communication to the specific focus group, a special relationship between brands, influencers, and the end users is being created, which, after all, secures better positioning of the brand, as well as the growth of sales. The paper probes into differences and similarities between the online and offline marketing, and elaborates on the research conducted on a sample comprised of business subject representatives and social networks users from Bosnia and Herzegovina, Croatia, and Serbia, by analysing the peculiarities of influence marketing and contrasting the acquired results with the outcomes of the previously conducted global-scale studies.","published_in":"CroDiM : International Journal of Marketing Science ; ISSN 2584-7236 (Online) ; Volume 3 ; Issue 1","year":"2020","subject_orig":"generacija C; digitalni marketing; marketing na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama; influencer marketing; vjerodostojnost; generation C; digital marketing; social networks marketing; credibility","subject":"generacija C; digitalni marketing; marketing na dru\u0161tvenim mre\u017eama; influencer marketing; vjerodostojnost; generation C; digital marketing; social networks marketing; credibility","authors":"Kosti\u0107 Stankovi\u0107, Milica; Bijak\u0161i\u0107, Sanja; \u0106ori\u0107, Nino","link":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/236265","oa_state":"1","url":"22dd240daeea3f3b51b87b25caecfccc31e7826abc60b87421d312b712b32aa1","relevance":37},{"id":"13977b11891cfc9dd39b9fc8588dd5f998c45d75b288c1c489e51007998f4c29","relation":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/238561","identifier":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/238561; https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/file\/346443","title":"IMPACT OF POLITICAL MARKETING IN DIGITAL ENVIRONMENT ON VOTERS REGARDING THEIR AREA OF RESIDENCE ; UTJECAJ POLITI\u010cKOG MARKETINGA U DIGITALNOM OKRU\u017dENJU NA BIRA\u010cE S OBZIROM NA MJESTO STANOVANJA","paper_abstract":"Political parties use market information to influence shaping of a product they are offering. Political marketing is defined as a relationship between the political subject and the market. It refers to those political actors who have realized the importance, effect and techniques of business marketing. It studies relationships between products of political organizations and demands of the market. Political marketing uses techniques of marketing in order to reach its goals. Today\u2019s 21st century is marked by the use of electronic media. The Internet is a basis of everyday life. Political marketing has recognized trends and has directed a large percentage of action on digital environment. The greatest advantage of political e-marketing is efficient communication with a large number of potential consumers, in this case, of political subjects with their potential voters. Long-term goal of political subjects is political power. There is no difference between the application of traditional and political marketing in digital environment. This paper presents results of a research whose aim was determining whether political marketing in digital environment has a bigger influence on voters in rural or in urban electoral units. Research sample consisted of voters in the IV and the VIII electoral units during electoral campaign for Croatian Parliament in 2016. Research was conducted using a questionnaire among potential voters. The aforementioned electoral units were chosen due to their differences, the IV being a predominantly rural electoral unit, and the VIII as a predominantly urban electoral unit. The results show that there is no difference between voters in the IV and the VIII electoral units; in other words, that influence of political marketing in digital environment is almost the same regardless of the voters\u2019 area of residence. It is necessary to emphasize that the Republic of Croatia is a specific area in which political marketing has a weak influence on voters. This research can aid better understanding of political marketing in digital environment and can become a foundation of marketing strategy of political subjects in the next elections for Parliament. ; Politi\u010dke stranke koriste tr\u017ei\u0161ne informacije kako bi utjecale na oblikovanje proizvoda kojeg nude. Politi\u010dki marketing se definira kao odnos izme\u0111u politi\u010dkog subjekta i tr\u017ei\u0161ta. Odnosi se na one aktere politike koji su shvatili va\u017enost, u\u010dinak i tehnike poslovnog marketinga. Prou\u010dava odnose izme\u0111u proizvoda politi\u010dke organizacije i zahtjeva tr\u017ei\u0161ta. Politi\u010dki marketing koristi tehnike marketinga kako bi ostvario svoje ciljeve. Dana\u0161nje 21. stolje\u0107e obilje\u017eava kori\u0161tenje elektroni\u010dkih medija. Temelj svakodnevnog \u017eivota je Internet. Politi\u010dki marketing je prepoznao trendove, te je usmjerio visoki postotak djelovanje na digitalno okru\u017eenje. Najve\u0107a prednost politi\u010dkog e-marketinga je efikasna komunikacija s velikim brojem potencijalnih potro\u0161a\u010da, u slu\u010daju politi\u010dkih subjekta potencijalnih glasa\u010da. Dugoro\u010dni cilj politi\u010dkih subjekta je politi\u010dka vlast. Nema razlike izme\u0111u primjene tradicionalnog i politi\u010dkog marketinga u digitalnom okru\u017eenju. U ovom radu su prikazani rezultati istra\u017eivanja \u010diji je cilj bio utvrditi utje\u010de li politi\u010dki marketing u digitalnom okru\u017eenju vi\u0161e na glasa\u010de u ruralnim ili urbanim izbornim jedinicama. Ispitni uzorak su bili bira\u010di u IV. i VIII. izbornoj jedinici prilikom izborne kampanje za Hrvatski sabor 2016. godine. Istra\u017eivanje se provelo kroz anketni upitnik me\u0111u potencijalnim bira\u010dima. Navedene izborne jedinice su izabrane zbog svojih razli\u010ditosti, IV. kao prete\u017eito ruralna izborna jedinica i VIII. kao prete\u017eito urbana izborna jedinica. Rezultati istra\u017eivanja su prikazali kako nema razlika izme\u0111u bira\u010da IV. i VIII. izborne jedinice, odnosno kako je utjecaj politi\u010dkog marketinga u digitalnom okru\u017eenju gotovo jednak bez obzira na podru\u010dje u kojem bira\u010di \u017eive. Potrebno je istaknuti kako je Republika Hrvatska specifi\u010dno podru\u010dje u kojem politi\u010dki marketing ima nizak utjecaj na glasa\u010de. Ovo istra\u017eivanje mo\u017ee doprinijeti bolje razumijevanju politi\u010dkog marketinga u digitalnom okru\u017eenje, te mo\u017ee postati temelj marketin\u0161ke strategije politi\u010dkih subjekata za idu\u0107e parlamentarne izbore.","published_in":"International journal of multidisciplinarity in business and science ; ISSN 1849-0581 (Online) ; Volume 6 ; Issue 9","year":"2020","subject_orig":"political marketing; e-political marketing; rural electoral unit; urban electoral unit; politi\u010dki marketing; e-politi\u010dki marketing; ruralna izborna jedinica; urbana izborna jedinica","subject":"political marketing; e-political marketing; rural electoral unit; urban electoral unit; politi\u010dki marketing; e-politi\u010dki marketing; ruralna izborna jedinica; urbana izborna jedinica","authors":"Keli\u0107, Ivan; Stilin, \u017darko; Tolu\u0161i\u0107, Zdravko","link":"https:\/\/hrcak.srce.hr\/238561","oa_state":"1","url":"13977b11891cfc9dd39b9fc8588dd5f998c45d75b288c1c489e51007998f4c29","relevance":36},{"id":"4d61f7fe5a6e966ef321a034b7e08d7a47fad97c9a149a0e0c10b7a4e58800d3","relation":"http:\/\/journals.euser.org\/index.php\/ejme\/article\/view\/4649\/4516; http:\/\/journals.euser.org\/index.php\/ejme\/article\/view\/4649; doi:10.26417\/ejme.v3i1.p63-71","identifier":"http:\/\/journals.euser.org\/index.php\/ejme\/article\/view\/4649; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.26417\/ejme.v3i1.p63-71","title":"International Marketing in the Digital Era. Collaboration of Sustainable and Contemporary Knowledge","paper_abstract":"We witness unprecedented turn to the digital marketing. International Marketing, as a specific field of the marketing science, is no exception of the general trend. In this article, the trendsetters are presented, but also a different approach is followed. It is argued that the new metrics should be taken into consideration, but at the same time, the sustainable knowledge should not be neglected, because the traditional knowledge should work in conjunction with the newly appeared marketing tools. What is more, the \u201cnew\u201d metrics are often built on the solid foundation of prior knowledge, which every marketing professional should be armed with.","published_in":"European Journal of Marketing and Economics; Vol 3 No 1 (2020): January - April 2020; 63-71 ; 2601-8667 ; 2601-8659","year":"2020-01-01","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Zhelev, Christian","link":"http:\/\/journals.euser.org\/index.php\/ejme\/article\/view\/4649","oa_state":"1","url":"4d61f7fe5a6e966ef321a034b7e08d7a47fad97c9a149a0e0c10b7a4e58800d3","relevance":35},{"id":"35b2c3499d2493a6074206c2c25155c24aaeb5e174e3477b3d9606f8bf1e3347","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7383246","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7383246","title":"Aplicaci\u00f3n de la Norma ISO 9001: 2015 en Instituciones de Educaci\u00f3n Superior (IES). Caso de estudio ; Instituto Superior Tecnol\u00f3gico ISMAC","paper_abstract":"The ISO 9001: 2015 Quality Standard assumes a set of standards oriented mainly to the optimization of resources and an adequate management of business management in general ; many companies in Ecuador ; especially dedicated to manufacturing ; apply it as part of their policy Internal quality ; since it is not mandatory ; however ; service companies also apply it to obtain an improvement in the perception of customer service ; which is combined in a competitive advantage of the institutions that apply it. This study focuses on demonstrating the level of knowledge of the people of managerial and administrative level of the Institutions of Higher Education (IES) and especially the case study of the Technological Institute of Administration ; Commerce and Marketing ISMAC ; with the benefits obtained by its accreditation in the first instance of the ISO 9001: 2008 Standard and its subsequent transition to the ISO 9001: 2015 Standard ; which implies a joint work of all personnel. In addition ; it has been corroborated through field research ; that there is a lack of knowledge about the ISO Standard as such and in the same way the advantages or benefits that it brings to management. It was established in the same way that very few HEIs have applied this norm due to ignorance ; even due to a lack of generalized Quality culture in the country ; therefore ; to help know the advantages of an implementation of a Quality Management System It is intended to socialize the experience acquired by the ISMAC ; as part of the study. ; La Norma de Calidad ISO 9001:2015 supone un conjunto de est\u00e1ndares orientado principalmente a la optimizaci\u00f3n de los recursos y un adecuado manejo de la gesti\u00f3n empresarial en forma general ; muchas empresas en Ecuador sobre todo dedicadas a la manufactura la aplican como parte de su pol\u00edtica interna de calidad ; ya que no es obligatoria ; sin embargo las empresas de servicios tambi\u00e9n la aplican para obtener una mejora en la percepci\u00f3n del servicio al cliente ; lo que se conjuga en una ventaja competitiva de las instituciones que la aplican. Este estudio se centra en demostrar el nivel de conocimiento de las personas de nivel directivo y administrativo de las Instituciones de Educaci\u00f3n Superior (IES) y sobre todo el estudio de caso del Instituto Tecnol\u00f3gico de Administraci\u00f3n ; Comercio y Mercadeo ISMAC ; con los beneficios obtenidos por su acreditaci\u00f3n en primera instancia de la Norma ISO 9001:2008 y su posterior transici\u00f3n a la Norma ISO 9001:2015 ; lo que supone un trabajo en conjunto de todo el personal. Adem\u00e1s ; se ha corroborado a trav\u00e9s de la investigaci\u00f3n de campo ; que existe un desconocimiento sobre la Norma ISO como tal y de la misma forma las ventajas o beneficios que trae a la gesti\u00f3n. Se estableci\u00f3 de la misma forma que muy pocas IES han aplicado esta norma por desconocimiento ; incluso por una falta de cultura de Calidad generalizada en el pa\u00eds ; por lo tanto ; para ayudar a conocer las ventajas de una implementaci\u00f3n de un Sistema de Gesti\u00f3n de Calidad se pretende socializar la experiencia adquirida por el ISMAC ; como parte del estudio.","published_in":"593 Digital Publisher CEIT ; ISSN 2588-0705 ; Vol. 5 ; N\u00ba. 2 ; 2020 ; pags. 150-163","year":"2020","subject_orig":"quality; ISO 9001: 2015; educational quality; accreditation; calidad; ISO 9001:2015; calidad educativa; acreditaci\u00f3n","subject":"quality; ISO educational quality; accreditation; calidad; ISO calidad educativa; acreditaci\u00f3n","authors":"Toapanta Cisneros; Keyerman; Calvache; Javier","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7383246","oa_state":"2","url":"35b2c3499d2493a6074206c2c25155c24aaeb5e174e3477b3d9606f8bf1e3347","relevance":34},{"id":"561b2200b5cbc6809f0b0344af481d1ca686b36caa789ea95bb35eb2cb5948cc","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7398381","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7398381","title":"Res\u00famenes de art\u00edculos acad\u00e9micos para la presentaci\u00f3n de alimentos nutritivos y saludables. Una revista digital","paper_abstract":"La utilizaci\u00f3n de herramientas de marketing digital se ha constituido en favorables medios para la difusi\u00f3n de la informaci\u00f3n en diferentes \u00e1mbitos de las ciencias. La Revista Digital que se presenta ser\u00e1 una publicaci\u00f3n acad\u00e9mica semestral que tiene por objetivo la difusi\u00f3n de resultados de investigaciones y estudios t\u00e9cnicos realizados por docentes y estudiantes de grado en \u00e1reas vinculadas sobre todo a Tecnolog\u00eda de Alimentos ; Ciencias de la Salud y Nutrici\u00f3n ; Emprendimiento. La publicaci\u00f3n acad\u00e9mica ser\u00e1 una compilaci\u00f3n de los res\u00famenes de Art\u00edculos de Investigaci\u00f3n obtenidos de la elaboraci\u00f3n de productos bajo las categor\u00edas de: Alimentos Enriquecidos y Fortificados ; Alimentos Funcionales y Superfoods ; Alimentos Fitness y Diet\u00e9ticos ; Snacks Nutritivos e Innovadores ; Postres Nutritivos e Innovadores ; Bebidas Nutritivas e Innovadoras ; Snacks Deportivos ; Colaci\u00f3n Escolar ; Alimentos Libres de Gluten ; Alimentos Veganos ; en los cuales se ha valorado bajo normas nacionales e internacionales su calidad nutricional ; inocuidad y aspectos relacionados a sus caracter\u00edsticas sensoriales y de aceptabilidad ; ejes que permiten apreciar tambi\u00e9n la innovaci\u00f3n de los productos. La revista ser\u00e1 presentada en un formato PDF convertido en HTML5 o Flipsnack que puede ser le\u00edda a trav\u00e9s de un navegador con conexi\u00f3n a internet ; Widget es proporcionado por FlipSnack para colocarlo en el sitio Web. La calidad de los contenidos y al tratarse de una revista con bases cient\u00edficas puede ser una importante gu\u00eda de informaci\u00f3n digital ; con temas de actualidad e innovadores en el campo de la alimentaci\u00f3n para profesionales en el \u00e1rea de la salud y nutrici\u00f3n.","published_in":"Polo del Conocimiento: Revista cient\u00edfico - profesional ; ISSN 2550-682X ; Vol. 5 ; N\u00ba. 4 ; 2020 ; pags. 70-85","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Revista; digital; innovaci\u00f3n; alimentaci\u00f3n; ciencia; nutrici\u00f3n","subject":"Revista; digital; innovaci\u00f3n; alimentaci\u00f3n; ciencia; nutrici\u00f3n","authors":"Guerra Torres; Isabel Enma Del Pilar; Garc\u00eda Guerra; Jazm\u00edn Isabel","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7398381","oa_state":"2","url":"561b2200b5cbc6809f0b0344af481d1ca686b36caa789ea95bb35eb2cb5948cc","relevance":33},{"id":"7f9fc81aca01752bd97cff8aa3ffb59e0a89752d6ed09d8ec8d0160e76cd93b9","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7398679","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7398679","title":"Characterization and challenges of livestock farming in Mediterranean protected mountain areas (Sierra Nevada ; Spain)","paper_abstract":"Aim of study: To characterize and analyse the extensive livestock farming systems in environmental protected area and propose strategies for their sustainable improvement.Area of study: Sierra Nevada Protected Area (Spain)Material and methods: Data were collected from a sample of 85 farmers and 48 experts. The information from farmers was expressed in 35 variables ; 23 of which were qualitative and 12 quantitative. A multivariate analysis was conducted.Main results: The principal components explained 71.2% of the total variance and the k-means cluster analysis identified three groups: C1 (38 farms) ; medium-size farms with a predominance of goats and relative dairy specialization ; C2 (12 farms) ; large-size farms with extensive grazing lands ; a high proportion of meat purpose animals and managed by young and dynamic farmers and C3 (35 farms) ; medium-size farms with a high proportion of meat purpose animals and undeveloped business management. The main problems reported were: insufficient pastures for livestock ; stagnation of product prices ; lack of generational renewal and need for social recognition of livestock farming. These obstacles could be overcome by implementing measures aimed at improving feed self-sufficiency -and thus reduce production costs- increasing income through social recognition of farming ; achieving product differentiation ; and strengthening short marketing channels. This would be favoured by an increase in associationism and specialized training.Research highlights: Farm management and marketing are important for improve these farming systems. The extensive livestock farming continues to be an important activity in European protected mountain areas.","published_in":"Spanish journal of agricultural research ; ISSN 2171-9292 ; null 18 ; N\u00ba. 1 ; 2020","year":"2020","subject_orig":"grazing systems; multivariate analysis; ruminant; national park","subject":"grazing systems; multivariate analysis; ruminant; national park","authors":"Ruiz Morales; Francisco de As\u00eds; V\u00e1zquez; Marta; Cam\u00fa\u00f1ez Ruiz; Jos\u00e9 Antonio; Castel Gen\u00eds; Jos\u00e9 Mar\u00eda; Mena Guerrero; Yolanda","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7398679","oa_state":"2","url":"7f9fc81aca01752bd97cff8aa3ffb59e0a89752d6ed09d8ec8d0160e76cd93b9","relevance":32},{"id":"fe1898e98f1d685e5fa659f298b41e3384043cd27de53da82580038bad843df1","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7389049","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7389049","title":"Percepci\u00f3n pol\u00edtica y su impacto en el marketing ecuatoriano","paper_abstract":"Justification: The article exposes and gathers some research variables in the knowledge of political perception and its impact on political marketing. The study maintains predominance in the field of communication ; social networks ; political society ; candidates ; electoral campaigns ; actions that contribute to the perception and persuasion of our Ecuadorian political target. Objective: to identify some perceptions of voters and their impact on political marketing actions ; and analogous behavior in the pre-election stage of political communication ; guiding future candidates in planning ; organizing and elaborating on an electoral crusade. Scientific Technical Background: knowledge in political communication and perception as a starting point and landfall. The problem was rooted in the link between transparency and the eradication of high-cost corruption. Methodology: has a predominant quantitative approach ; with a basic modality of field research ; bibliographic-documentary ; exploratory ; cross-sectional descriptive ; to analyze and interpret. Results: 384 surveys were applied to cantons of Tungurahua ; of all ages and strata ; of legal age. Resources: materials and scientists oriented on the basis of the research project of 05-29-2018 were used ; and their management is under the responsibility of the authors of this article. ; El art\u00edculo expone y re\u00fane algunas variables de investigaci\u00f3n en el conocimiento de la percepci\u00f3n pol\u00edtica y su impacto en el marketing pol\u00edtico. El estudio sostiene predominio en el \u00e1mbito de la comunicaci\u00f3n ; redes sociales ; sociedad pol\u00edtica ; candidatos ; campa\u00f1as electorales ; acciones que contribuyen a la percepci\u00f3n y persuasi\u00f3n de nuestro target pol\u00edtico ecuatoriano. Objetivo: identificar algunas percepciones de los electores y su impacto frente a las acciones de marketing pol\u00edtico ; y conductas an\u00e1logas en la etapa preelectoral de la comunicaci\u00f3n pol\u00edtica ; orientando a futuros candidatos en planificaci\u00f3n ; organizaci\u00f3n y elaboraci\u00f3n en una cruzada electoral. Fundamentaci\u00f3n T\u00e9cnico Cient\u00edfico: conocimiento en comunicaci\u00f3n pol\u00edtica y percepci\u00f3n como punto de partida y de recalada. El Problema se radic\u00f3 en la vinculaci\u00f3n entre la transparencia y erradicaci\u00f3n de la corrupci\u00f3n que tiene un costo elevado. Metodolog\u00eda: tiene un enfoque predominante cuantitativo ; con una modalidad b\u00e1sica de investigaci\u00f3n de campo ; bibliogr\u00e1fica-documental ; exploratoria ; descriptivo transversal ; para analizar e interpretar. Resultados: s\u00e9 aplic\u00f3 384 encuestas a cantones de Tungurahua ; de todas las edades y estratos ; mayores de edad. Recursos: se utiliz\u00f3 materiales y cient\u00edficos orientados sobre la base del proyecto de investigaci\u00f3n del 29-05-2018 ; y su gesti\u00f3n corre bajo la responsabilidad de los autores de este art\u00edculo.","published_in":"CIENCIAMATRIA ; ISSN 2542-3029 ; Vol. 6 ; N\u00ba. 10 ; 2020 ; pags. 4-28","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Percepci\u00f3n; Marketing; Comunicaci\u00f3n; Campa\u00f1as electorales; Target pol\u00edtico; Perception; Communication; Electoral campaigns; Political target","subject":"Percepci\u00f3n; Marketing; Comunicaci\u00f3n; Campa\u00f1as electorales; Target pol\u00edtico; Perception; Communication; Electoral campaigns; Political target","authors":"Mari\u00f1o Garc\u00e9s; Karen Dennise; Quinapanta Gonz\u00e1lez; Edgar David; Ballesteros L\u00f3pez; Leonardo; Guerrero Vel\u00e1stegu\u00ed; C\u00e9sar Andr\u00e9s","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7389049","oa_state":"2","url":"fe1898e98f1d685e5fa659f298b41e3384043cd27de53da82580038bad843df1","relevance":31},{"id":"6b0aa205b213baa6c3fd8d82d365d509f49cc22853b3f2bc41c4a35ab37ebd5a","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7416835","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7416835","title":"Effect of brand trust and commitment of a mobile wallet in Indonesia","paper_abstract":"The objective of this document is to analyze a trust brand model within the use of mobile wallets in Indonesia in 2020. 460 people were surveyed using the machine's formula. The result of this search shows that; Brand confidence has a positive effect on brand engagement, with a significant path coefficient of 0.338, with P values of 0.002 <a significance level of 0.05. The study finding gives a new marketing idea, in understanding the reasons for the importance of the brand trust factor among the use of mobile wallet in Indonesia. ; El objetivo de este documento es analizar un modelo de marca de confianza dentro del uso de billeteras m\u00f3viles en Indonesia en 2020. 460 personas fueron encuestadas utilizando la f\u00f3rmula de la m\u00e1quina. El resultado de esta b\u00fasqueda muestra que; la confianza de la marca tiene un efecto positivo en el compromiso de la marca, con un coeficiente significativo de trayectoria de 0.338, con valores P de 0.002 <un nivel de significancia de 0.05. El hallazgo del estudio da una nueva idea de marketing, en la comprensi\u00f3n y razones de la importancia del factor confianza de la marca entre el uso de la billetera m\u00f3vil en Indonesia","published_in":"Utop\u00eda y praxis latinoamericana: revista internacional de filosof\u00eda iberoamericana y teor\u00eda social, ISSN 1316-5216, null 25, N\u00ba. 2, 2020, pags. 397-405","year":"2020","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Putra, H.D.; Astuti, E.S.; Kusumawati, A.; Abdillah, Y.","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7416835","oa_state":"2","url":"6b0aa205b213baa6c3fd8d82d365d509f49cc22853b3f2bc41c4a35ab37ebd5a","relevance":30},{"id":"ba682de1adf7aa3761b95485c0ce5ca8a14427ad40de6683c8ab3de8a878b921","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7471232; (Revista) ISSN 1390-9770","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7471232","title":"Marketing de contenidos como estrategia de enfoque promocional en los establecimientos comerciales de la parroquia Le\u00f3nidas Plaza, cant\u00f3n Sucre","paper_abstract":"This paper analyzes content marketing strategies through the use of social networks such as Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp for a target audience with the purpose of communicating and disseminating the service presented by commercial establishments in the Leonidas Plaza parish of the Sucre canton. The object of study allows to know the marketing strategies to verify its application, without forgetting that content marketing facilitates attracting and retaining customers with the constant creation of content with the intention of changing and improving consumer behavior in their favor. The research methods applied were descriptive, synthetic analytical, survey technique, interview, and observation, in addition to the Delphi method. The treatment of the information was carried out by means of the statistical tool of social sciences called SPSS, the results of the tool allow to conclude the deficient application of digital marketing strategies for the attraction of potential clients so it is necessary that the new ones be made known strategies that are currently being applied alongside technology such as social networks. ; El presente trabajo analiza estrategias de marketing de contenidos mediante uso de redes sociales como Facebook, Instagram y WhatsApp para un p\u00fablico objetivo con el prop\u00f3sito de comunicar y divulgar el servicio que presentan establecimientos comerciales de la parroquia Le\u00f3nidas Plaza del cant\u00f3n Sucre. El objeto de estudio permite conocer las estrategias de marketing para verificar su aplicaci\u00f3n, sin olvidar que el marketing de contenidos facilita atraer y retener a los clientes con la constante creaci\u00f3n de contenidos con la intenci\u00f3n de cambiar y mejorar el comportamiento del consumidor a su favor. Los m\u00e9todos de investigaci\u00f3n aplicados fueron el descriptivo, anal\u00edtico sint\u00e9tico, t\u00e9cnica de encuesta, entrevista, y la observaci\u00f3n, adem\u00e1s del m\u00e9todo Delphi. El tratamiento de la informaci\u00f3n fue realizado mediante la herramienta estad\u00edstica de ciencias sociales llamada SPSS, los resultados de la herramienta permiten concluir la deficiente aplicaci\u00f3n de estrategias de marketing digital para la atracci\u00f3n de clientes potenciales por lo que es necesario que se d\u00e9 a conocer las nuevas estrategias que se est\u00e1n aplicando en la actualidad junto a la tecnolog\u00eda como las redes sociales.","published_in":"Sinapsis: La revista cient\u00edfica del ITSUP, ISSN 1390-9770, Vol. 2, N\u00ba. 17, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: La actualidad demuestra la relevancia de las ciencias de la salud y la educaci\u00f3n)","year":"2020","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Villacis Zambrano, Lilia; Mu\u00f1oz Ch\u00e1vez, Jorge; Mej\u00eda Ruperti, Luis M.; Garc\u00eda Rodr\u00edguez, Reynier","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7471232","oa_state":"2","url":"ba682de1adf7aa3761b95485c0ce5ca8a14427ad40de6683c8ab3de8a878b921","relevance":29},{"id":"afc75bc5899f2a1c905879d54cd0c71a8ddbc769a7909108a9b9cb79d5d4628b","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7471241; (Revista) ISSN 1390-9770","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7471241","title":"Marketing digital al servicio de la gesti\u00f3n universitaria. Caso de estudio: la carrera ingenier\u00eda de sistemas de la UNESUM, Ecuador","paper_abstract":"Higher education has seen the need to adopt new advertising practices as a response to multiple political, technological and social changes, as well as to increased competition and internationalization. The purpose of this work is to assess the technological potentials, the feasibility and willingness of teachers and managers of the Computer Systems Engineering degree to integrate digital marketing into their strategy for displaying results and offers at the State University of Sur de Manab\u00ed in Ecuador, 31 teachers were surveyed, 1 Doctor of Science, 30 Masters and 2 with management and university management positions. The results obtained allow us to determine the feasibility of using digital marketing in the management of university processes, as a way to show educational options to different segments of the population, with the support of the social web. The diagnostic process facilitated the analysis of the marketing process and the training needs of teachers and administrators. ; La educaci\u00f3n superior se ha visto en la necesidad de adoptar nuevas pr\u00e1cticas de publicidad como respuesta a los m\u00faltiples cambios pol\u00edticos, tecnol\u00f3gicos y sociales, as\u00ed como al aumento de la competencia y la internacionalizaci\u00f3n. El presente trabajo tiene como prop\u00f3sito valorar las potencialidades tecnol\u00f3gicas, la factibilidad y disposici\u00f3n de los docentes y gestores de la carrera Ingenier\u00eda en Sistemas Computacionales para integrar el marketing digital a su estrategia de visualizaci\u00f3n de resultados y ofertas en la Universidad Estatal de Sur de Manab\u00ed en Ecuador, para ello se encuestaron 31 docentes, de ellos 1 Doctor en Ciencias, 30 M\u00e1sters y 2 con cargos de direcci\u00f3n y gesti\u00f3n universitaria. Los resultados obtenidos permiten determinar la factibilidad de utilizar el marketing digital en la gesti\u00f3n de los procesos universitarios, como v\u00eda para mostrar las opciones educativas a los diferentes segmentos de la poblaci\u00f3n, con el apoyo de la web social. El proceso de diagn\u00f3stico facilit\u00f3 el an\u00e1lisis del proceso de marketing y las necesidades de capacitaci\u00f3n de los docentes y administrativos.","published_in":"Sinapsis: La revista cient\u00edfica del ITSUP, ISSN 1390-9770, Vol. 2, N\u00ba. 17, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: La actualidad demuestra la relevancia de las ciencias de la salud y la educaci\u00f3n)","year":"2020","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mero Suarez, Karina; Merch\u00e1n Carre\u00f1o, Edwin Joao; Mero Su\u00e1rez, Carlos Ren\u00e1n","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7471241","oa_state":"2","url":"afc75bc5899f2a1c905879d54cd0c71a8ddbc769a7909108a9b9cb79d5d4628b","relevance":28},{"id":"8f710049edd6d254738bf7938098ae8a51a4e5a27bfba054d9ddd148169eb9fa","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475492; (Revista) ISSN 2477-9024","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475492","title":"Propuesta de servicio de guarder\u00eda para peluquer\u00eda y Spa","paper_abstract":"The main objective of this research is to propose a childcare service in the Spa & Hairdressing salon in northern Guayaquil - Ecuador, since it was able to observe the Hairdressers & Spa lately they have suffered a decrease in the influx of customers, due to the competition that is increasingly strong and because people have less and less time to attend these places. A study was carried out to know the acceptance of a nursery in a hairdressing salon or Spa, through a descriptive investigation, among the results obtained was the demand for home beauty work because the mothers took care of time to attend the Spa, So the proposal of the marketing strategies to implement a nursery, will help the mothers to assist the companions of their sons or daughters, which ensures the permanence in the place. ; El principal objetivo de esta investigaci\u00f3n es proponer un servicio de guarder\u00eda en los Spa & Peluquer\u00eda del norte de Guayaquil \u2013 Ecuador, ya que se pudo observar que las Peluquer\u00edas & Spa \u00faltimamente han tenido un descenso de afluencia de clientes, por la competencia que cada vez es m\u00e1s fuerte y porque las personas cada vez tienen menos tiempo para poder asistir a estos lugares. Se realiz\u00f3 un estudio para conocer la aceptaci\u00f3n de una guarder\u00eda dentro de una peluquer\u00eda o Spa, a trav\u00e9s de una investigaci\u00f3n descriptiva, entre los resultados obtenidos fue que surgi\u00f3 la demanda de trabajos de belleza a domicilio porque las madres carec\u00edan de tiempo para asistir a los Spa, por lo que la propuesta de las estrategias de marketing para implementar una guarder\u00eda, va a ayudar a las madres de familia a asistir acompa\u00f1adas de sus hijos o hijas, lo que asegurar\u00e1 la permanencia en el lugar.","published_in":"INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Enero - Abril, 2020)), pags. 138-149","year":"2020","subject_orig":"marketing strategies; differentiation; positioning; estrategias de marketing; diferenciaci\u00f3n; posicionamiento","subject":"marketing strategies; differentiation; positioning; estrategias de marketing; diferenciaci\u00f3n; posicionamiento","authors":"Torres Andrade, Jos\u00e9; Chedraui, Lorraine","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475492","oa_state":"2","url":"8f710049edd6d254738bf7938098ae8a51a4e5a27bfba054d9ddd148169eb9fa","relevance":27},{"id":"2a5f4ecb8a0529723cf773e3889180a7ac99442b8a6b6c96b25acc4132f55d30","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7407117; (Revista) ISSN 2007-0934","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7407117","title":"Producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n del mamey Alpoyeca, Guerrero: opini\u00f3n de productores","paper_abstract":"M\u00e9xico es el principal productor de mamey (Pouteria sapota) en el mundo; sin embargo, se percibe que la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n del fruto es afectado por diversos factores biol\u00f3gicos, t\u00e9cnicos y socioecon\u00f3micos que impactan negativamente en el desarrollo de la cadena productiva. Para tener evidencia directa del caso, en 2017 se entrevist\u00f3 a productores de mamey del municipio de Alpoyeca, Guerrero, planteando como objetivo conocer y analizar su opini\u00f3n de la problem\u00e1tica para la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n. Se entrevistaron 50 productores de mamey que mediante un cuestionario se capt\u00f3 la informaci\u00f3n. Los factores que afectan la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n del mamey se agruparon en biol\u00f3gicos, t\u00e9cnicos y socioecon\u00f3micos. Los biol\u00f3gicos est\u00e1n relacionados con la presencia de plagas y enfermedades que afectan dr\u00e1sticamente la vida \u00fatil de las plantas y el fruto. Los problemas t\u00e9cnicos declarados fueron plantas avejentadas, manejo deficiente de la huerta que afecta la producci\u00f3n, sanidad y calidad del fruto. Los socioecon\u00f3micos tienen que ver con la falta de recursos econ\u00f3micos, bajo precio del producto, falta de apoyo institucional e intermediarismo. De esta manera, la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n es afectada por manejo deficiente de la huerta debido a desconocimiento t\u00e9cnico de los productores, por la escasa solvencia econ\u00f3mica, falta de mercado seguro y el no haber apoyo institucional, lo cual es agravado por la escasa organizaci\u00f3n de productores ; Mexico is the main producer of mamey (Pouteria sapota) in the world; however, it is perceived that the production and commercialization of the fruit is affected by various biological, technical and socioeconomic factors that negatively impact the development of the production chain. To have direct evidence of the case, in 2017, mamey producers from the municipality of Alpoyeca, Guerrero were interviewed, aiming to know and analyze their opinion of the problem for production and marketing. Fifty mamey producers were interviewed and the information was collected through a questionnaire. The factors that affect the production and commercialization of mamey were grouped into biological, technical and socioeconomic. Biologics are related to the presence of pests and diseases that drastically affect the useful life of plants and fruit. The declared technical problems were aging plants, poor management of the orchard that affects production, health and quality of the fruit. Socioeconomics have to do with the lack of economic resources, low product prices, lack of institutional support and intermediaries. In this way, production and marketing is affected by poor management of the garden due to technical ignorance of the producers, low economic solvency, lack of a secure market and the lack of institutional support, which is aggravated by the poor organization of producers","published_in":"Revista mexicana de ciencias agr\u00edcolas, ISSN 2007-0934, Vol. 11, N\u00ba. 3, 2020, pags. 635-647","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Pouteria sapota; organizaci\u00f3n; percepciones; organization; perceptions","subject":"Pouteria sapota; organizaci\u00f3n; percepciones; organization; perceptions","authors":"Lainez Loyo, Eduardo; Olvera Hern\u00e1ndez, Jos\u00e9 Isabel; Guerrero Rodr\u00edguez, Juan de Dios; Aceves Ru\u00edz, Ernesto; \u00c1lvarez Calder\u00f3n, Norma Marcela; Andrade Navia, Juan Manuel","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7407117","oa_state":"2","url":"2a5f4ecb8a0529723cf773e3889180a7ac99442b8a6b6c96b25acc4132f55d30","relevance":26},{"id":"6da38103f5449e480d3aee199f131753498d23d91f2f72fdb5cb914ae050b8c9","relation":"http:\/\/www.ijrte.org\/archive\/; 1. (ISSN 2277-3878).; 2277-3878; http:\/\/elartu.tntu.edu.ua\/handle\/lib\/31512","identifier":"http:\/\/elartu.tntu.edu.ua\/handle\/lib\/31512","title":"Qualimetric Analysis of Pipelines with Corrosion Surfaces in the Monitoring System of Oil and Gas Enterprises","paper_abstract":"The introduction of new technologies for diagnosing underground metal pipelines with dangerous surface defects is a practically important task. That is why studies aimed at improving the methods of assessing the quality of deformed metal pipelines and structural elements are necessary and relevant. The evaluation of the effectiveness of engineering and technological solutions for oil and gas enterprises needs improvement. In this context, an important task is to solve the problem of quality control (including durability) of gas and oil transportation systems and the improvement of appropriate metrological support. Based on surface physics and fracture mechanics, development of a methodological approach to assessing the quality and resource of underground metal pipelines (UMP) of oil and gas enterprises, taking into account the constructions strength, corrosion fatigue, parameters of corrosion protection and metrological support. Results of processing of normative documents and scientific works in the field of gas transportation enterprises, as well as methods of surface physics, mechanics of deformed solid body, fracture mechanics, qualimetry regarding the system \u201cpipeline (UMP) \u2013 coating\u201d. A new criterion for the strength of the surface of a metal underground pipe is proposed, which characterizes the peculiarities of bond fractures (adhesion) between the coating and the metal. Using the criterion of the strength of a metal tube with a defect in the electrolyte, the dependence of the critical internal pressure of the gas pipeline (UMP) on the geometric and energy (elastic and plastic) parameters of the metal, as well as the current of the anodic dissolution, which characterizes the features of the crack propagation at the bottom of the corrosion cavern. On the basis of surface physics and fracture mechanics obtained, a methodology for evaluating the quality of underground metal pipelines of oil and gas enterprises was developed to determine their resource, taking into account strength, corrosion fatigue, parameters of corrosion protection and metrological support.","published_in":"","year":"2020-05-01","subject_orig":"pipeline; metal; oil and gas enterprises; structure degradation; fracture; cavern; crack; metrology; quality control; non-destructive testing; neural network","subject":"pipeline; metal; oil and gas enterprises; structure degradation; fracture; cavern; crack; metrology; quality control; non-destructive testing; neural network","authors":"Yuzevych, Volodymyr; Pavlenchyk, Nataliia; Zaiats, Olha; Heorhiadi, Nell\u0456; Lakiza, Viktoriia","link":"http:\/\/elartu.tntu.edu.ua\/handle\/lib\/31512","oa_state":"2","url":"6da38103f5449e480d3aee199f131753498d23d91f2f72fdb5cb914ae050b8c9","relevance":25},{"id":"fb3837ba2c0d2cedfcb0ace2c465d27316cf6dd93a62a548e0b3769bf9a774c4","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7237429","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7237429","title":"Actitudes hacia la estad\u00edstica en ciencias econ\u00f3mico-administrativas: un an\u00e1lisis por etapa de pregrado","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this research was to: 1) characterize attitudes towards statistics in the initial ; intermediate and final stages of undergraduate degrees in Administrative Economic Sciences and ; 2) determine the applications that students give to statistics during their university studies. 159 students (69.18% female and 30.81% male) participated in careers such as Human Resources ; Administration ; International Business and Marketing ; which answered a semantic differential questionnaire composed of seven pairs of extreme adjectives based on a scale of -3 to + 3. The results showed that ; during the three stages of the races (initial ; intermediate and final) ; the attitudes towards statistics remain somewhat positive (with averages of 0.73 ; 0.94 and 1.00 ; respectively) and that ; although their importance is perceived ; they are somewhat tense for students. It was also found that these attitudes are used to understand information ; calculate data and investigate. In addition ; possible explanations for such findings are discussed ; for example ; the teaching strategies of teachers and the academic history of students. ; La presente investigaci\u00f3n tuvo por objetivos: 1) caracterizar las actitudes hacia la estad\u00edstica en las etapas iniciales ; intermedias y finales de pregrados en Ciencias Econ\u00f3mico Administrativas y ; 2) determinar las aplicaciones que los alumnos dan a la estad\u00edstica durante sus estudios universitarios. Participaron 159 estudiantes (69.18% mujeres y 30.81% varones) de carreras como Recursos Humanos ; Administraci\u00f3n ; Negocios Internacionales y Mercadotecnia ; los cuales contestaron un cuestionario de diferencial sem\u00e1ntico integrado por siete pares de adjetivos extremos con base en una escala de -3 a +3. Los resultados mostraron que ; durante las tres etapas de las carreras (inicial ; intermedia y final) ; las actitudes hacia la estad\u00edstica se mantienen algo positivas (con promedios de 0.73 ; 0.94 y 1.00 ; respectivamente) y que ; aunque se percibe su importancia ; son algo tensas para los estudiantes. Asimismo ; se encontr\u00f3 que dichas actitudes son utilizadas para comprender informaci\u00f3n ; calcular datos e investigar. Adem\u00e1s ; se discuten posibles explicaciones para tales hallazgos ; por ejemplo ; las estrategias didacticas de los docentes y la historia acad\u00e9mica de los estudiantes.","published_in":"Apuntes Universitarios ; ISSN 2225-7136 ; Vol. 10 ; N\u00ba. 1 ; 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Revista de Investigaci\u00f3n Apuntes Universitarios) ; pags. 14-26","year":"2020","subject_orig":"attitudes; statistics; undergraduate; utility; Economic-Administrative Sciences; actitudes; estad\u00edstica; pregrado; utilidad; Ciencias Econ\u00f3mico-Administrativas","subject":"attitudes; statistics; undergraduate; utility; Economic-Administrative Sciences; actitudes; estad\u00edstica; pregrado; utilidad; Ciencias Econ\u00f3mico-Administrativas","authors":"Torres Ceballos; Carlos Gerardo","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7237429","oa_state":"2","url":"fb3837ba2c0d2cedfcb0ace2c465d27316cf6dd93a62a548e0b3769bf9a774c4","relevance":24},{"id":"ec0ab55d78def1a4d34f7bb2ee0cbdcabd5fb2006bf3a38ff30c6aef8fe69de5","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7246964","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7246964","title":"\u201cEl traje nuevo del empresario\u201d: el uso de la etnograf\u00eda en la investigaci\u00f3n de mercados","paper_abstract":"Abstract: Objective\/context: In the last ten years ; ethnography has consolidated itself as a central service in the portfolio of many market research companies in Colombia that offer their clients consumer ethnographies. The objective of this article is to describe and analyze how market research professionals understand and use ethnography. Methodology: The research that led to this article involved several phases. Initially ; we identified the institutions that offer consumer ethnographies in Colombia. This was followed by an analysis of the service portfolios of these institutions ; as well as an analysis of the discourse with which they offer their services ; particularly in terms of ethnographic studies. Finally ; more than twenty interviews were conducted with market research professionals in Bogot\u00e1 ; Cali and Medell\u00edn ; all with experience in carrying out consumer ethnographies. Conclusions: Despite the fact that professionals in this field have recently opened up spaces for debate in academia ; in Colombia ; the process of integrating the ethnographic method into market research companies has not been analyzed in depth. An example of this is that at the XVII Congress of Anthropology in Colombia in 2019 ; for the first time ; there were four tables devoted to anthropology applied to consumption ; markets ; industry ; and business. Originality: These spaces are ideal for discussing the postulates and findings of this article ; especially our conclusion that ; in the field of market research ; the discourse of anthropology is used and instrumentalised to endow consumer ethnographies with academic and scientific legitimacy ; even though its methodological practices and assumptions tend to be underestimated. ; Resumo: Objetivo\/contexto: Nos \u00faltimos dez anos ; a etnografia se estabeleceu como um servi\u00e7o central do portf\u00f3lio de muitas empresas de pesquisa de mercado na Col\u00f4mbia que oferecem etnografias de consumo a seus clientes. O objetivo deste artigo \u00e9 descrever e analisar como os profissionais de pesquisa de mercado compreendem e utilizam a etnografia. Metodologia: A pesquisa que deu origem a este artigo teve v\u00e1rias fases. Inicialmente ; foram identificadas as institui\u00e7\u00f5es que oferecem etnografias de consumo na Col\u00f4mbia. Em seguida ; os portf\u00f3lios de servi\u00e7os das institui\u00e7\u00f5es identificadas ; bem como o discurso com o qual oferecem seus servi\u00e7os ; em particular o de estudos etnogr\u00e1ficos ; foram analisados. Por fim ; foram realizadas mais de vinte entrevistas com profissionais de pesquisa de mercado em Bogot\u00e1 ; Cali e Medell\u00edn ; todos com experi\u00eancia na realiza\u00e7\u00e3o de etnografias de consumo. Conclus\u00f5es: Na Col\u00f4mbia ; o processo de integra\u00e7\u00e3o do m\u00e9todo etnogr\u00e1fico nas empresas de pesquisa de mercado n\u00e3o foi analisado em profundidade ; ainda que os profissionais dessa \u00e1rea estejam abrindo espa\u00e7o para o debate na academia. Um exemplo disso \u00e9 que no XVII Congresso de Antropologia da Col\u00f4mbia de 2019 ; pela primeira vez ; havia quatro mesas dedicadas \u00e0 antropologia aplicada ao consumo ; mercados ; ind\u00fastria e empresas. Originalidade: Esses espa\u00e7os s\u00e3o ideais para discutir os postulados e as conclus\u00f5es deste artigo ; especialmente a de que ; no campo da pesquisa de mercado ; o discurso da antropologia \u00e9 utilizado e instrumentalizado para dotar a etnografia de consumo de legitimidade acad\u00eamica e cient\u00edfica ; embora suas pr\u00e1ticas e suposi\u00e7\u00f5es metodol\u00f3gicas sejam desprezadas. ; Resumen: Objetivo\/contexto: En los \u00faltimos diez a\u00f1os ; la etnograf\u00eda se ha consolidado como un servicio central del portafolio de muchas empresas de investigaci\u00f3n de mercados en Colombia que ofrecen a sus clientes etnograf\u00edas de consumo. El objetivo de este art\u00edculo es describir y analizar la manera como los profesionales de la investigaci\u00f3n de mercados entienden y emplean la etnograf\u00eda. Metodolog\u00eda: La investigaci\u00f3n que dio lugar a este art\u00edculo tuvo varias fases. Inicialmente ; se identificaron las instituciones que ofrecen etnograf\u00edas de consumo en Colombia. A continuaci\u00f3n ; se hizo el an\u00e1lisis de los portafolios de servicios de las instituciones identificadas ; as\u00ed como el an\u00e1lisis del discurso con el que ofrecen sus servicios ; en particular el de estudios etnogr\u00e1ficos. Finalmente ; se realizaron m\u00e1s de veinte entrevistas a profesionales de la investigaci\u00f3n de mercados en Bogot\u00e1 ; Cali y Medell\u00edn ; todos con experiencia en la realizaci\u00f3n de etnograf\u00edas de consumo. Conclusiones: En Colombia no ha sido analizado en profundidad el proceso de integraci\u00f3n del m\u00e9todo etnogr\u00e1fico en las empresas de investigaci\u00f3n de mercados ; a pesar de que recientemente profesionales de este campo est\u00e1n abriendo espacios para hacer el debate en la academia. Un ejemplo de esto es que en el XVII Congreso de Antropolog\u00eda en Colombia de 2019 por primera vez hubo cuatro mesas dedicadas a antropolog\u00eda aplicada al consumo ; los mercados ; la industria y las empresas. Originalidad: Estos espacios son ideales para discutir los postulados y hallazgos de este art\u00edculo ; en especial nuestra conclusi\u00f3n de que ; en el campo de la investigaci\u00f3n de mercados ; se usa e instrumentaliza el discurso de la antropolog\u00eda para dotar las etnograf\u00edas de consumo de legitimidad acad\u00e9mica y cient\u00edfica ; aunque sus pr\u00e1cticas y presupuestos metodol\u00f3gicos son desestimados.","published_in":"Ant\u00edpoda: Revista de Antropolog\u00eda y Arqueolog\u00eda ; consumer ethnographies; consumption studies; ethnography; market research; marketing; Antropologia empresarial; estudos de consumo; etnografia; etnografia do consumidor; pesquisa de mercados","authors":"Garc\u00eda Gonz\u00e1lez; David; Gonz\u00e1lez V\u00e9lez; C\u00e9sar","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7246964","oa_state":"2","url":"ec0ab55d78def1a4d34f7bb2ee0cbdcabd5fb2006bf3a38ff30c6aef8fe69de5","relevance":23},{"id":"bb2aacb2188d095f138c5e30373ee7469b1f2e42d1ad1203180f7560c0e2a162","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7292320","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7292320","title":"Din\u00e2mica do marketing de relacionamento online: qualidade do relacionamento e lealdade dos clientes em bancos iranianos","paper_abstract":"Purpose \u2013 The purpose of this paper is to show the dynamics of relationship marketing in e-banking by examining the association between relationship quality and online customer loyalty at different stages of the relationship lifecycle. Design\/methodology\/approach \u2013 A sample of 651 customers of Iranian banks in East Azerbaijan Province who had used online banking services was selected for the study after completing a questionnaire. The research hypotheses were tested using structural equation modeling and the AMOS23 software. Findings \u2013 The results showed that the level of the customer relationship determines the effect of relationship quality on customer loyalty in e-banking. Specifically, the effect of online commitment on customer loyalty decreases over time. In addition, as the relationship develops between the customer and the business, the influence of online trust on loyalty increases. Originality\/value \u2013 The main contribution of this paper is it enriches the relationship marketing literature with respect to the dynamics of relationships by challenging the effectiveness of relationship marketing, especially the use of the same relational constructs (online satisfaction, trust, and commitment) for customers at different stages of the relationship lifecycle. ; Objetivo \u2013 O objetivo deste trabalho \u00e9 mostrar a din\u00e2mica do marketing de relacionamentos no e-banking por meio do exame da associa\u00e7\u00e3o entre a qualidade do relacionamento e a lealdade do cliente online nos diferentes est\u00e1gios do ciclo de vida do relacionamento. Metodologia \u2013 Para este estudo, foi selecionada uma amostra de 651 clientes de bancos iranianos da Prov\u00edncia do Azerbaij\u00e3o do Leste que utilizaram servi\u00e7os banc\u00e1rios online, ap\u00f3s preenchimento de um question\u00e1rio. As hip\u00f3teses da pesquisa foram testadas utilizando a Modelagem das Equa\u00e7\u00f5es Estruturais e o software AMOS23. Resultados \u2013 Os resultados mostraram que o n\u00edvel do relacionamento com o cliente determina o efeito da qualidade do relacionamento na lealdade do cliente no e-banking. Especificamente, o efeito do compromisso online sobre a lealdade do cliente decresce ao longo do tempo. Al\u00e9m disso, com o desenvolvimento do relacionamento entre o cliente e o neg\u00f3cio, a influ\u00eancia da confian\u00e7a online sobre a lealdade aumenta. Contribui\u00e7\u00f5es \u2013 A principal contribui\u00e7\u00e3o deste trabalho \u00e9 enriquecer a literatura sobre marketing de relacionamento quanto \u00e0 din\u00e2mica do relacionamento, questionando a efetividade do marketing de relacionamento, especialmente o uso dos mesmos construtos relacionais (satisfa\u00e7\u00e3o, confian\u00e7a e compromisso online) para os clientes nos diferentes est\u00e1gios do ciclo de vida do relacionamento.","published_in":"RBGN: Revista Brasileira de Gest\u00e3o de Neg\u00f3cios, ISSN 1806-4892, Vol. 22, N\u00ba. 1, 2020, pags. 140-162","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Marketing de relacionamento din\u00e2mico; qualidade do relacionamento online; lealdade online; ciclo de vida do relacionamento; e-banking; dynamic relationship marketing; online relationship quality; online loyalty; relationship lifecycle","subject":"Marketing de relacionamento din\u00e2mico; Akram; Aali; Samad; Bafandeh Zendeh; Alireza; Iranzadeh; Soleyman","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7292320","oa_state":"2","url":"bb2aacb2188d095f138c5e30373ee7469b1f2e42d1ad1203180f7560c0e2a162","relevance":22},{"id":"070c2b8551b5c799fc22e28891cffed43aaa1e8463046df9c3b65d9e552d7c83","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7312729","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7312729","title":"El sentido de la comunicaci\u00f3n en adolescentes de una Casa Hogar en Chiapas","paper_abstract":"This article examined the social reality in fourteen high school teenagers in a House Home of Tuxtla Guti\u00e9rrez ; Chiapas ; with the purpose of interpreting the sense of communication that minors have constructed ; o recognize if there are oppressive codes and standard models that are counterbalanced by the notion of awareness ; which prevent them from having a broad vision of life forms when interacting with society and have a critical position to develop ; through three main actions: first ; the knowledge of the bases under which the communicational processes are established through the discursive trajectories ; histories and life experiences ; second ; the identification of the relationship that exists between subject ; culture and power in the construction of sense ; and finally ; the analysis of the data ; through the triangulation of the categories ; subcategories and dimensions found. This research used the qualitative methodology ; with the combination of two perspectives: the interpretation and the Participatory Action Research (IAP) from a critical approach ; where the categories considered were: A microsociological framework ; psychosociological guidelines and individual characteristics ; the subcategories were: instrumental ; evaluative ; belonging ; security ; disciplinary ; religious and use of power ; in the objective-subjective dimensions. The results obtained were presented in three perspectives: In politics ; the use of vertical hierarchical discursive power ; the imposition of religion as a model of indoctrination for the modification of behavior ; in the culture ; the manipulation of subjectivities ; through the domestication of feelings through discipline to be good people and the acquisition of values in the way of becoming good Christians ; and in the economic sphere ; the construction of an instrumental-material sense ; the induction to an alienating visual programming and marketing positioning. ; El presente art\u00edculo examin\u00f3 la realidad social en catorce adolescentes de secundaria en una Casa Hogar de Tuxtla Guti\u00e9rrez ; Chiapas ; con el prop\u00f3sito de interpretar el sentido de la comunicaci\u00f3n que han construido los menores ; para reconocer si existen c\u00f3digos opresores y modelos est\u00e1ndares que se contrarresten con la noci\u00f3n de concientizaci\u00f3n ; mismos que les impidan tener una visi\u00f3n amplia de las formas de vida al interactuar con la sociedad y poseer una postura cr\u00edtica para desarrollarse ; mediante tres acciones principales: primero ; el conocimiento de las bases bajo las que se establecen los procesos comunicacionales a trav\u00e9s de las trayectorias discursivas ; historias y experiencias de vida ; segunda ; la identificaci\u00f3n de la relaci\u00f3n que existe entre sujeto ; cultura y poder en la construcci\u00f3n del sentido ; y por \u00faltimo ; el an\u00e1lisis de los datos ; a trav\u00e9s de la triangulaci\u00f3n de las categor\u00edas ; subcategor\u00edas y dimensiones encontradas. En la investigaci\u00f3n se emple\u00f3 la metodolog\u00eda cualitativa ; con la combinaci\u00f3n de dos perspectivas: la de interpretaci\u00f3n y la Investigaci\u00f3n Acci\u00f3n Participativa (IAP) desde un enfoque cr\u00edtico ; donde las categor\u00edas consideradas fueron: Un marco microsociol\u00f3gico ; pautas psicosociol\u00f3gicas y caracter\u00edsticas individuales ; las subcategor\u00edas fueron: instrumental ; valorativa ; pertenencia ; seguridad ; disciplinar ; religiosa y uso del poder ; en las dimensiones objetivo-subjetivas. Los resultados obtenidos se presentaron en tres perspectivas: En la pol\u00edtica ; el uso del poder discursivo jer\u00e1rquico vertical ; la imposici\u00f3n de la religi\u00f3n como modelo de adoctrinamiento para la modificaci\u00f3n del comportamiento ; en la cultura ; la manipulaci\u00f3n de las subjetividades ; a trav\u00e9s de la domesticaci\u00f3n de sentimientos por medio de la disciplina para ser buenas personas y la adquisici\u00f3n de valores en el camino de llegar a ser buenos cristianos ; y en el plano econ\u00f3mico ; la construcci\u00f3n de un sentido instrumental-material ; la inducci\u00f3n a una programaci\u00f3n visual alienante y el posicionamiento de marketing.","published_in":"Revista Internacional de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo (RICD) ; ISSN 2386-3730 ; Vol. 3 ; N\u00ba. 11 ; 2020 ; pags. 52-66","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Comunicaci\u00f3n; sentido social; adolescentes; casa hogar; proceso cr\u00edtico","subject":"Comunicaci\u00f3n; sentido social; adolescentes; casa hogar; proceso cr\u00edtico","authors":"Rodr\u00edguez Aguilar; Ver\u00f3nica","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7312729","oa_state":"2","url":"070c2b8551b5c799fc22e28891cffed43aaa1e8463046df9c3b65d9e552d7c83","relevance":21},{"id":"7b31712f9d3f72f013a63733bfba36128e90c0f54d2fec77173b3e0c9d9b3d00","relation":"doi:10.5281\/zenodo.3779623; https:\/\/zenodo.org\/communities\/mat-journals; https:\/\/zenodo.org\/record\/3779624; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5281\/zenodo.3779624; oai:zenodo.org:3779624","identifier":"https:\/\/zenodo.org\/record\/3779624; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5281\/zenodo.3779624","title":"How Artificial Intelligence Influences the Marketing","paper_abstract":"Artificial Intelligence is the new revolution in the business and in past few years it is indulged in various fields like science, business, medicine, automation and education, AI is also reached in the marketing business. Most of the big companies are using AI for their advertisement in digital platforms. AI has been changing the way of marketing and sales with consumer perception and its behaviour. The author of the paper is suggested the research about an AI, what it is and how deeply it is applied in marketing and what marketing practitioners can do with AI implication. The author of the paper is also addressing the impact of AI in marketing and sales and to investigate the AI result. The main aim of the paper is to served the idea about how AI will be going to transformed the marketing & sales strategies digitally with the machine learning algorithms, the paper is also highlighted, how the AI will be more effective if it makes lager in the future (rather than replace) human manager.
