Disponible en: https:\/\/journals.plos.org\/plosone\/article\/file?type=printable&id=10.1371\/journal.pone.0183301 [20\/02\/2020].; http:\/\/revistas.unileon.es\/index.php\/cuestionesdegenero\/article\/view\/6156; doi:10.18002\/cg.v0i15.6156","identifier":"http:\/\/revistas.unileon.es\/index.php\/cuestionesdegenero\/article\/view\/6156; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.18002\/cg.v0i15.6156","title":"La igualdad de g\u00e9nero en la investigaci\u00f3n sobre RRPP y redes sociales: An\u00e1lisis Bibliom\u00e9trico en Web of Science y Scopus=Gender equality in research on PR and social networks: Bibliometric analysis in Web of Science and Scopus","paper_abstract":"ResumenPese a los avances logrados todav\u00eda se pueden observar desigualdades de g\u00e9nero en la investigaci\u00f3n en comunicaci\u00f3n al existir barreras en el acceso de las mujeres a puestos directivos. Debido a que publicar en revistas de prestigio y la productividad en investigaci\u00f3n son factores esenciales para la promoci\u00f3n se pretende localizar, sintetizar y comparar en funci\u00f3n del sexo de la autor\u00eda la producci\u00f3n cient\u00edfica sobre RRPP, comunicaci\u00f3n corporativa y redes sociales. Para ello se ha realizado un an\u00e1lisis bibliom\u00e9trico de los art\u00edculos indexados en Web of Science y Scopus entre 1995 y 2018 relacionados con esta tem\u00e1tica. La investigaci\u00f3n parece indicar que ellas son m\u00e1s productivas y que existen importantes similitudes en la producci\u00f3n cient\u00edfica de hombres y mujeres.AbstractDespite the progress made, gender inequalities can still be observed in the field of research in communication research as there are barriers in women\u2019s access to managerial positions. Due to publishing in prestigious journals and research productivity are essential factors for promotion, the aim is to locate, synthesize and compare the scientific production on PR, corporate communication and social networks based on the gender of authorship. For this purpose, a bibliometric analysis of the articles indexed in Web of Science and Scopus between 1995 and 2018 related to this topic has been carried out. This work seems to indicate that women are more productive, and that there are important similarities in the scientific production of men and women.","published_in":"Cuestiones de g\u00e9nero: de la igualdad y la diferencia; N\u00fam. 15 (2020): G\u00e9nero, Ciencia, Tecnolog\u00eda e Innovaci\u00f3n; 341-362 ; 2444-0221 ; 10.18002\/cg.v0i15","year":"2020-06-25","subject_orig":"g\u00e9nero; mujer; desigualdad; investigaci\u00f3n; an\u00e1lisis bibliom\u00e9trico; relaciones p\u00fablicas; redes sociales; gender; woman; inequality; research; bibliometric analysis; public relations; social networks","subject":"g\u00e9nero; mujer; desigualdad; investigaci\u00f3n; an\u00e1lisis bibliom\u00e9trico; relaciones p\u00fablicas; redes sociales; gender; woman; inequality; research; bibliometric analysis; public relations; social networks","authors":"Navarro-Beltr\u00e1, Mari\u00e1n; Miquel-Segarra, Susana; L\u00f3pez Font, Lorena","link":"http:\/\/revistas.unileon.es\/index.php\/cuestionesdegenero\/article\/view\/6156","oa_state":"1","url":"dd521502cb9b8901f46aec81ced8f9c1ee94754d211f00820e419da8d96f96cd","relevance":19},{"id":"c1e60747d4b9d26197979221af8fadd09c864bedb6e3a78dead0ca8041493e2b","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22593; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2015.v4.i1.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22593; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2015.v4.i1.01","title":"Editorial","paper_abstract":"El presente n\u00famero de Commons recoge una variedad de art\u00edculos. Cada uno de ellos se corresonde con una de las principales l\u00edneas editoriales que dan sentido a nuestro trabajo editorial. Y el elemento com\u00fan a todos ellos es el car\u00e1cter cr\u00edtico con el que se releen las diversas pr\u00e1cticas y an\u00e1lisis que se mueven en el amplio y fluido territorio de la comunicaci\u00f3n, la tecnolog\u00eda, la pol\u00edtica y la transformaci\u00f3n social. As\u00ed, el primero de ellos, Nuevas tecnolog\u00edas y cambio social: los yayoflautas se organizan en red para generar transformaciones sociales, remite a una de las redes m\u00e1s activas y originales que formaron parte del movimiento 15m. Los yayoflautas ejemplifican una ruptura respecto al imaginario dominante del \u201cmayor\u201d, concebido como alguien pol\u00edticamente conservador y tecnol\u00f3gicamente reservado respecto a las tendencias dominantes. En este art\u00edculo, firmado por Mari\u00e1n Alonso (Universidad de Sevilla) se rompen estos estereotipos, para explorar los modos en los que estos abuelos se apropian de la web social o participativa para impulsar sus acciones.","published_in":"Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital - COMMONS 2015 Vol. 4 N. 1","year":"2020-03-13T09:22:58Z","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mari Saez, Victor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22593","oa_state":"1","url":"c1e60747d4b9d26197979221af8fadd09c864bedb6e3a78dead0ca8041493e2b","relevance":18},{"id":"2d6328609a6131622dec92061a3166607a150dde233e0de00d87a8db657bc364","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22542; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2017.v6.i1.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22542; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2017.v6.i1.01","title":"Towards a Critical Political Economy of Indicators. Measuring and Evaluating \u201cAlteratively\u201d Communication, Development and Social Change ; Hacia una Econom\u00eda Pol\u00edtica Cr\u00edtica del indicador. Medir y evaluar \u201calterativamente\u201d la comunicaci\u00f3n, el desarrollo y el cambio social.","paper_abstract":"Is a critical political economy of indicators necessary? We came to this conclusion some years ago after analysing the indicators used to measure the social uses of Internet (Mar\u00ed, 2012). We were able to check how, in the reference reports, social and political uses of Internet took a secondary place. At the same time, analysis, practises and visions of antiglobalistic social movements were absent or invisible. It seems as if indicators had acquired a life of their own in these traditional reports, breaking away from reality \u2013especially from the social and political dimensions of reality\u2013, but this autonomization process has not been accompanied by a liberation from the capitalistic teleology that guides it. Therefore, it was necessary \u2013such was our approach\u2013 to repair this system of absences in a double sense. Firstly, through a theoretical and conceptual work, aimed to define new indicators, more \u201csocial\u201d and \u201cpolitical\u201d, that allow us to overcome our current shortcomings when measuring the citizen and social needs of the Internet. Secondly, opening up ways to overcome the reductionism of indicators conceived under the dominant mercantilistic logic. ; \u00bfEs necesaria una Econom\u00eda Pol\u00edtica Cr\u00edtica del indicador? Hace unos a\u00f1os lleg\u00e1bamos a esta conclusi\u00f3n, tras analizar los indicadores utilizados para medir los usos sociales de Internet (Mar\u00ed, 2012). Pod\u00edamos comprobar c\u00f3mo, en los informes de referencia, los usos sociales y pol\u00edticos de Internet ocupaban un lugar secundario. Al mismo tiempo, en ellos estaban ausentes e invisibilizados los an\u00e1lisis, las pr\u00e1cticas y las visiones de los movimientos sociales altermundialistas. Pareciera como si en estos informes al uso los indicadores hubiesen cobrado vida propia, independiz\u00e1ndose de lo real \u2013 especialmente de la dimensi\u00f3n social y pol\u00edtica de la realidad\u2013 sin que este proceso de autonomizaci\u00f3n fuese acompa\u00f1ado de una liberaci\u00f3n de la teleolog\u00eda capitalista que los orienta. Se hac\u00eda necesario, por tanto \u2013este era nuestro planteamiento\u2013 recomponer este sistema de ausencias, en un doble sentido. En primer lugar, mediante un trabajo te\u00f3rico y conceptual, dirigido a definir nuevos indicadores, m\u00e1s \u201csociales\u201d y \u201cpol\u00edticos\u201d, que permitan superar las carencias actuales en la medici\u00f3n de los usos ciudadanos y sociales de Internet. En segundo lugar, abriendo v\u00edas para la superaci\u00f3n del reduccionismo de los indicadores concebidos bajo la l\u00f3gica mercantilista dominante.","published_in":"Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital - COMMONS 2017 Vol. 6 N. 1 pp. 1-10","year":"2020-03-09T11:49:04Z","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mar\u00ed S\u00e1ez, V\u00edctor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22542","oa_state":"1","url":"2d6328609a6131622dec92061a3166607a150dde233e0de00d87a8db657bc364","relevance":17},{"id":"f5264ac6fc141c11f6c1636d60e006da2352e5db29096dad42b8e21a309a3467","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22636; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2013.v2.i2.02","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22636; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2013.v2.i2.02","title":"Comunicaci\u00f3n, desarrollo y cambio social en Espa\u00f1a: Entre la institucionalizaci\u00f3n y la implosi\u00f3n del campo ; Communication, development and social change in Spain: between the institutionalization and the implosion of the field","paper_abstract":"El presente trabajo da cuenta del proceso de institucionalizaci\u00f3n de la Comunicaci\u00f3n para el Desarrollo y el Cambio Social (CDCS) en Espa\u00f1a en la primera d\u00e9cada del siglo XXI, despu\u00e9s de un periodo de olvido y de marginaci\u00f3n. La hip\u00f3tesis de partida es que el actual momento de expansi\u00f3n de la CDCS en el contexto espa\u00f1ol puede ser analizado como una implosi\u00f3n del campo, esto es, como una ruptura hacia dentro, debido a la inconsistencia y debilidad con la que se institucionaliz\u00f3. El enfoque metodol\u00f3gico es la revisi\u00f3n documental (Erlandson, 1993; MacDonald y Tipton, 1993; Mills, 1959;) de la literatura acad\u00e9mica y de los informes sobre el tema producidos en el contexto espa\u00f1ol entre 1980 y 2010. Asimismo, el art\u00edculo establece relaciones entre la construcci\u00f3n del campo de la CDCS en Espa\u00f1a y los procesos llevados a cabo a escala mundial, con el objetivo de establecer las continuidades y discontinuidades pertinentes. ; This paper wants to give an account of the process of institutionalization of Communication for Development and Social change (CDCS) in Spain in the first decade of the 21st century, after a long period of oblivion and marginalization. The initial hypothesis is that during the current expansion of the CDCS in the Spanish context, this boom can be analyzed as an implosion of this field, that is, as a break inwards, due to the inconsistency and the weakness with which it was built in the institutionalization phase. Methodologically, the work has been done from the perspective of the document review (Erlandson, 1993) MacDonald and Tipton, 1993; Mills, 1959) of the academic literature and reports produced in the Spanish context for the past 30 years. The article also establishes relations between the construction of the field of the CDCS in Spain and the processes carried out worldwide, with the aim of establishing relevant discontinuities and continuities.","published_in":"COMMONS - Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital Vol.2 n\u00ba2 pp. 39-64","year":"2020-03-23T09:05:20Z","subject_orig":"Comunicaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo; Comunicaci\u00f3n y Cambio Social; institucionalizaci\u00f3n; ONG; movimientos sociales; Communication and Development; Communication and Social Change; institutionalization; NGOs; social movements","subject":"Comunicaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo; Comunicaci\u00f3n y Cambio Social; institucionalizaci\u00f3n; ONG; movimientos sociales; Communication and Development; Communication and Social Change; institutionalization; NGOs; social movements","authors":"Mar\u00ed S\u00e1ez, Victor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22636","oa_state":"1","url":"f5264ac6fc141c11f6c1636d60e006da2352e5db29096dad42b8e21a309a3467","relevance":16},{"id":"dac249f2c107e9563a3ab24c4f794d8beb60b7f0fd2c0737755b8ffb13c06e9d","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22646; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2014.v3.i2.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22646; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2014.v3.i2.01","title":"EDITORIAL Commons Vol.3 n\u00ba2","paper_abstract":"El t\u00e9rmino Comunicambio ha servido, en los \u00faltimos tiempos, para aglutinar a comunicadores y comunicadoras del contexto espa\u00f1ol interesados por un enfoque de la comunicaci\u00f3n que pone el \u00e9nfasis en el impulso de procesos de cambio social. El hashtag #Comunicambio en Twitter, el grupo con el mismo nombre en Facebook, las iniciativas de formaci\u00f3n de la CONGDE organizadas en los dos \u00faltimos a\u00f1os con este nombre o el pr\u00f3ximo congreso e-Comunicambio Social (Universidad Jaume I, Castell\u00f3n, 2015) son algunos de los acontecimientos que dan cuenta de este proceso de articulaci\u00f3n.","published_in":"COMMONS - Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital Vol.3 n\u00ba2 pp. 1-2","year":"2020-03-25T08:11:30Z","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mari Saez, Victor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22646","oa_state":"1","url":"dac249f2c107e9563a3ab24c4f794d8beb60b7f0fd2c0737755b8ffb13c06e9d","relevance":15},{"id":"a057a91a245743c301cd605de8151988e609225342dc28ca4d908ab393e290a6","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22527; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2016.v5.i1.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22527; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2016.v5.i1.01","title":"Editorial","paper_abstract":"El presente n\u00famero de Commons. \u0e04\u0e34\u0e14\u0e40\u0e1b\u0e47\u0e19\u0e23\u0e49\u0e2d\u0e22\u0e25\u0e30 100The purposes of this study were to study the factors of business administration model of Electronic Integrated Circuits toward Smart Industry, to develop a business administration model and to create a manual of business administration roadmap of electronic integrated circuits toward smart industry. The research was conducted by mixed qualitative and quantitative research approach. Qualitative data collection methods were done by in-depth interview and exploratory focus groups. A questionnaire was used to gather primary data and information from 412 survey samples. The statistics for summarizing the results contain average, standard deviation and exploratory factor analysis (EFA). As result, a development of business administration model of electronics integrated circuits toward smart industry constitutes 5 core factors and 24 sub-factors; 1) The management factor, 2) The supply chain & logistics management factor, 3) The production & operation management factor, 4) The digital marketing management factor, and 5) The human resources factor. The highest Eigen Value & Percent of Variance is the Human resources factor at 53.497. The manual consists of guidelines based on each subcomponent, key success indicators and adaptation of business administration model of electronic integrated circuits toward smart industry. New York: PublicAffairs.; https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/30917; doi:10.1344\/der.2020.37.208-229","identifier":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/30917; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1344\/der.2020.37.208-229","title":"A Critical look at Educational Technology from a Distance Education Perspective","paper_abstract":"This article focuses on educational technology as applied in the context of programs and institutions that offer completely distance education courses. All education in the 21st century is digital education in that the use of networking, text and image creation and editing and search and retrieval of information punctuates the life of almost every teacher and student. However, the context of distance education \u2013 where all the interactions are mediated, creates a unique and heightened context of digitalization. This paper focuses on two questions: (1) What aspects have not been completely satisfactory in the transit and transformation that education has undergone, from its more traditional, campus-based conception, towards its new configuration marked by the continuous use of digital technologies and environments? (2) In order what are the future challenges that distance education must deal with to support sustainability of this teaching model?From a theoretical and interpretative analysis, based on the review of relevant articles and documents on distance education, some critical dimensions (limitations, unkept promises and future challenges) the use of digital technologies in distance education is identified and subsequently analyzed. These dimensions evidence how the initial (sometimes excessive) enthusiasm about the insertion of digital technologies in distance education has not (yet?) been fully reflected in reality.","published_in":"Digital Education Review; No 37 (2020): Number 37 June 2020 [Monographic] Digital learning: distraction or default for the future; 208-229 ; 2013-9144","year":"2020-06-30","subject_orig":"education; pedagogy; sociology; distance education; online education; learning analytics; educational technology; threaded discussion","subject":"education; pedagogy; sociology; distance education; online education; learning analytics; educational technology; threaded discussion","authors":"Anderson, Terry; Rivera-Vargas, Pablo","link":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/30917","oa_state":"2","url":"7b7c8727e5bd5dc1b20d8010306364cc3dfca2e7e04d89212c7a385328eba5b7","relevance":12},{"id":"efb816b3429bf39b2d672327618bc711885f3c4be20e65f058df4d0c92386087","relation":"https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325\/333; Cwalina W., Falkowski A., Newman B. URL: https:\/\/twitter.com\/gudkovd\/status\/1076033621662810113 (\u0434\u0430\u0442\u0430 \u043e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0449\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f 26.05.2019).; https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325; doi:10.32603\/2412-8562-2020-6-3-5-20","identifier":"https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.32603\/2412-8562-2020-6-3-5-20","title":"Storytelling of Political Leaders as an Instrument of Symbolic Politics ; \u0421\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u043b\u0438\u043d\u0433 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043b\u0438\u0434\u0435\u0440\u043e\u0432 \u043a\u0430\u043a \u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u0441\u0438\u043c\u0432\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0438","paper_abstract":"Introduction. The article attempts to analyze the attempts of political leaders of various types to build political communications in the new social reality - on the Internet. The material of the study was taken from the storytelling of the three leaders in social networks during the first attempts to create elements of symbolic politics. In the process of analyzing this narration, we asked ourselves: - How much is the traditional image of a particular political leader related to his reflection on social networks? The relevance of the author's approach lies in the analysis of storytelling as a tool for the formation of symbolic politics and social reality. Political leaders moved into a virtual environment following their target audiences.Methodology and sources. The methodological basis of the work is verification on practical material of socio-philosophical concepts and models of political analysts, cultural scientists, sociologists (P. Shtompki, V.A. Yadova, O.Yu. Malinova, G.L. Tulchinsky and others). The article uses narratives obtained from open access social networks. To clarify the formation of social reality, a comparative analysis of the narratives of public leaders regarding the creation of a space of symbolic politics was carried out.Results and discussion. As a result of the study, theoretical models that describe the behavioral patterns of political leaders in the information society were verified. In the modern information society, the main focus is transferred to social networks, where the target audience of political figures spend their time. Political leaders follow their target audience in different ways by showing their presence on social networks, both quantitative and qualitative. As a result of the study, the distinctive features of storytelling of public politicians, the similarities and differences in the technologies for creating a full-fledged image of a leader in the mass consciousness of the target audience, the similarities and differences between the image of a political leader taking shape in traditional media and on the Internet are clarified.Conclusion. In 2018, we observe the phenomenon of the entry into the space of social networks of politicians with the aim of event formation of elements of symbolic politics. In the study of storytelling as a process of forming public communications, the roles of sources and actors are defined. In today's digital society, social networks play a critical role in the processes of generating social reality. The mechanisms for the formation of narratives may require additional research, but now we can determine their impact on the political, socio-cultural and business environment. ; As an element of a banking institution\u2019s marketing activity, they must be carefully planned, organized and controlled. The need to plan marketing communications in the bank stems from the fact that today it is difficult for consumers to navigate the banking services market. The ongoing competition for each consumer in the banking market drives banks to integrate marketing communications.Banks are in constant contact with customers of banking services, financial institutions, central banks, etc. Any bank requires interconnected communications that are constantly evolving to meet the changing external and internal environment. Thus, marketing communications play an important stage in the bank\u2019s marketing activity.In an age of digital economy, marketing communications are a prerequisite for improving the increasing the effectiveness of banks and their profitability.The practical aspects of ensuring the effectiveness of a bank\u2019s marketing communications are considered and explored in the article. The structure of the bank\u2019s marketing communications complex is influenced by the following factors: the level of management of the bank, the degree of purchasing power of the potential client, the strategy of promotion of banking services, the peculiarities of the complex of marketing communications of competitors and the financial capacity of the bank.In particular, digitalization (digitization) of the bank involves the modernization of the banking structure, products and channels of interaction with its customers by applying modern technologies to increase the effectiveness of marketing communications, increase profits and its competitiveness. ; \u041d\u0430 \u0441\u0435\u0433\u043e\u0434\u043d\u044f \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0435 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u0438\u0433\u0440\u0430\u044e\u0442 \u0432\u0430\u0436\u043d\u0443\u044e \u0440\u043e\u043b\u044c \u0432 \u0434\u0435\u044f\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u043e\u0432, \u043f\u043e\u0442\u043e\u043c\u0443 \u0447\u0442\u043e \u044d\u0442\u043e \u043e\u0434\u0438\u043d \u0438\u0437 \u0432\u0430\u0436\u043d\u0435\u0439\u0448\u0438\u0445 \u044d\u043b\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u043e\u0432 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0439 \u0434\u0435\u044f\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438. \u042d\u0442\u043e\u0442 \u044d\u043b\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0439 \u0434\u0435\u044f\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0430 \u043d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c\u043e \u0442\u0449\u0430\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e \u043f\u043b\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044c, \u043e\u0440\u0433\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0437\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044c \u0438 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0440\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044c \u0432\u0441\u0435 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0446\u0435\u0441\u0441\u044b.\u0411\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0442\u043e\u044f\u043d\u043d\u043e \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0440\u0443\u044e\u0442 \u0441 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u0431\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044f\u043c\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u043e\u0432\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u0443\u0441\u043b\u0443\u0433, \u0444\u0438\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0441\u043e\u0432\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0438\u0442\u0443\u0442\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0438 \u0446\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u044b\u043c\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0430\u043c\u0438. \u0414\u043b\u044f \u043b\u044e\u0431\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0430 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0435 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u043d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c\u043e \u0441\u043e\u0432\u0435\u0440\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044c \u0432 \u0441\u043e\u043e\u0442\u0432\u0435\u0442\u0441\u0442\u0432\u0438\u0438 \u0441 \u0438\u0437\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f\u043c\u0438 \u0432\u043d\u0435\u0448\u043d\u0435\u0439 \u0438 \u0432\u043d\u0443\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043d\u043d\u0435\u0439 \u0441\u0440\u0435\u0434\u044b.\u0412 \u044d\u043f\u043e\u0445\u0443 \u0440\u0430\u0437\u0432\u0438\u0442\u0438\u044f \u0446\u0438\u0444\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0439 \u044d\u043a\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043c\u0438\u043a\u0438 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0435 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u044f\u0432\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0442\u0441\u044f \u043f\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043f\u043e\u0441\u044b\u043b\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0448\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f \u044d\u0444\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u043e\u0432 \u0438 \u0438\u0445 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u0431\u044b\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438. \u041e\u0441\u043d\u043e\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0435 \u0432\u043d\u0438\u043c\u0430\u043d\u0438\u0435 \u043d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0438\u043c\u043e \u043e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0442\u044c \u043d\u0430 \u0446\u0438\u0444\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0439 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433, \u043a\u043e\u0442\u043e\u0440\u044b\u0439 \u044f\u0432\u043b\u044f\u0435\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0441\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043b\u044f\u044e\u0449\u0435\u0439 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u043e\u043d\u043d\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0430.\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u043c\u043e\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043d\u044b \u0438 \u0438\u0441\u0441\u043b\u0435\u0434\u043e\u0432\u0430\u043d\u044b \u043f\u0440\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0435 \u0430\u0441\u043f\u0435\u043a\u0442\u044b \u043e\u0431\u0435\u0441\u043f\u0435\u0447\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f \u044d\u0444\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0438 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0438\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0438\u0439 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0430. ; \u041d\u0430 \u0441\u044c\u043e\u0433\u043e\u0434\u043d\u0456 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0432\u0456\u0434\u0456\u0433\u0440\u0430\u044e\u0442\u044c \u0432\u0430\u0436\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0443 \u0440\u043e\u043b\u044c \u0443 \u0434\u0456\u044f\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432, \u043e\u0441\u043a\u0456\u043b\u044c\u043a\u0438 \u0446\u0435 \u043e\u0434\u0438\u043d \u0437 \u043d\u0430\u0439\u0432\u0430\u0436\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0456\u0448\u0438\u0445 \u0435\u043b\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0456\u0432 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0457 \u0434\u0456\u044f\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456. \u042f\u043a \u0435\u043b\u0435\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0457 \u0434\u0456\u044f\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432\u0441\u044c\u043a\u043e\u0457 \u0443\u0441\u0442\u0430\u043d\u043e\u0432\u0438, \u0457\u0445 \u043d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u0456\u0434\u043d\u043e \u0440\u0435\u0442\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e \u043f\u043b\u0430\u043d\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438, \u043e\u0440\u0433\u0430\u043d\u0456\u0437\u043e\u0432\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438 \u0442\u0430 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0440\u043e\u043b\u044e\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438. \u041d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u0456\u0434\u043d\u0456\u0441\u0442\u044c \u0437\u0430\u0431\u0435\u0437\u043f\u0435\u0447\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0435\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0439 \u0443 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0443 \u0432\u0438\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0454 \u0437 \u0442\u043e\u0433\u043e, \u0449\u043e \u0441\u044c\u043e\u0433\u043e\u0434\u043d\u0456 \u0441\u043f\u043e\u0436\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0447\u0430\u043c \u0441\u043a\u043b\u0430\u0434\u043d\u043e \u043e\u0440\u0456\u0454\u043d\u0442\u0443\u0432\u0430\u0442\u0438\u0441\u044f \u043d\u0430 \u0440\u0438\u043d\u043a\u0443 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0443\u0433. \u041d\u0430\u044f\u0432\u043d\u0430 \u043a\u043e\u043d\u043a\u0443\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u044f \u0437\u0430 \u043a\u043e\u0436\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0441\u043f\u043e\u0436\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0447\u0430 \u043d\u0430 \u0440\u0438\u043d\u043a\u0443 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0443\u0433 \u0441\u043f\u043e\u043d\u0443\u043a\u0430\u0454 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0438 \u0434\u043e \u0456\u043d\u0442\u0435\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044f \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0439.\u0411\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0438 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456\u0439\u043d\u043e \u043a\u043e\u043d\u0442\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0443\u044e\u0442\u044c \u0437\u0456 \u0441\u043f\u043e\u0436\u0438\u0432\u0430\u0447\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0443\u0433, \u0444\u0456\u043d\u0430\u043d\u0441\u043e\u0432\u0438\u043c\u0438 \u0456\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0438\u0442\u0443\u0442\u0430\u043c\u0438 \u0456 \u0446\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0440\u0430\u043b\u044c\u043d\u0438\u043c\u0438 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0430\u043c\u0438. \u0414\u043b\u044f \u0431\u0443\u0434\u044c-\u044f\u043a\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0443 \u043d\u0435\u043e\u0431\u0445\u0456\u0434\u043d\u0456 \u0432\u0437\u0430\u0454\u043c\u043e\u043f\u043e\u0432\u2019\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457, \u044f\u043a\u0456 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456\u0439\u043d\u043e \u0443\u0434\u043e\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043d\u0430\u043b\u044e\u044e\u0442\u044c\u0441\u044f \u0432\u0456\u0434\u043f\u043e\u0432\u0456\u0434\u043d\u043e \u0434\u043e \u0437\u043c\u0456\u043d \u0437\u043e\u0432\u043d\u0456\u0448\u043d\u044c\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0456 \u0432\u043d\u0443\u0442\u0440\u0456\u0448\u043d\u044c\u043e\u0433\u043e \u0441\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0449\u0430.\u0417\u043e\u043a\u0440\u0435\u043c\u0430, \u0432 \u0435\u043f\u043e\u0445\u0443 \u0440\u043e\u0437\u0432\u0438\u0442\u043a\u0443 \u0446\u0438\u0444\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0457 \u0435\u043a\u043e\u043d\u043e\u043c\u0456\u043a\u0438 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0457 \u0454 \u043f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0434\u0443\u043c\u043e\u0432\u043e\u044e \u043f\u0456\u0434\u0432\u0438\u0449\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0435\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432 \u0456 \u043f\u0440\u0438\u0431\u0443\u0442\u043a\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u0457\u0445\u043d\u044c\u043e\u0457 \u0434\u0456\u044f\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456.\u0420\u043e\u0437\u0433\u043b\u044f\u043d\u0443\u0442\u043e \u0456 \u0434\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0456\u0434\u0436\u0435\u043d\u043e \u043f\u0440\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0447\u043d\u0456 \u0430\u0441\u043f\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0438 \u0437\u0430\u0431\u0435\u0437\u043f\u0435\u0447\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0435\u0444\u0435\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0432\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0439 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0443. \u041d\u0430 \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043a\u0442\u0443\u0440\u0443 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u043b\u0435\u043a\u0441\u0443 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0445 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u0443\u043d\u0456\u043a\u0430\u0446\u0456\u0439 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0443 \u0432\u043f\u043b\u0438\u0432\u0430\u044e\u0442\u044c \u0442\u0430\u043a\u0456 \u0444\u0430\u043a\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438: \u0440\u0456\u0432\u0435\u043d\u044c \u043c\u0435\u043d\u0435\u0434\u0436\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442\u0443 \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0443, \u0441\u0442\u0443\u043f\u0456\u043d\u044c \u043a\u0443\u043f\u0456\u0432\u0435\u043b\u044c\u043d\u043e\u0457 \u0441\u043f\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043e\u0436\u043d\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u043f\u043e\u0442\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0456\u0439\u043d\u043e\u0433\u043e \u043a\u043b\u0456\u0454\u043d\u0442\u0430, \u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0442\u0435\u0433\u0456\u044f \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0441\u0443\u0432\u0430\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0431\u0430\u043d\u043a\u0456\u0432\u0441\u044c\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043f\u043e\u0441\u043b\u0443\u0433, \u043e\u0441\u043e\u0431\u043b\u0438\u0432\u043e\u0441\u0442\u0456 \u043a\u043e\u043c\u043f\u043b\u0435\u043a\u0441\u0443 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u0438\u0445 V.","link":"http:\/\/fkd.org.ua\/article\/view\/200151","oa_state":"1","url":"e591395b7fe5088db7da0389df84552f8e1469fe68e3110bf32d1fb3aa2f8b19","relevance":10},{"id":"45a7170526e1fb5780630612f3952d19b2f87d4af8d7acef5beec0c642aef29f","relation":"https:\/\/doi.org\/10.12731\/2218-7405-2018-5-114-138; https:\/\/openrepository.ru\/article?id=244687","identifier":"https:\/\/openrepository.ru\/article?id=244687","title":"DISCURSIVE REPRESENTATIONS OF \"DIGITAL GENERATION\" AND A NEW EDUCATION PARADIGM ; \u0414\u0418\u0421\u041a\u0423\u0420\u0421\u0418\u0412\u041d\u042b\u0415 \u0420\u0415\u041f\u0420\u0415\u0417\u0415\u041d\u0422\u0410\u0426\u0418\u0418 \"\u0426\u0418\u0424\u0420\u041e\u0412\u041e\u0413\u041e \u041f\u041e\u041a\u041e\u041b\u0415\u041d\u0418\u042f\" \u0418 \u0421\u041c\u0415\u041d\u0410 \u041f\u0410\u0420\u0410\u0414\u0418\u0413\u041c\u042b \u041e\u0411\u0420\u0410\u0417\u041e\u0412\u0410\u041d\u0418\u042f","paper_abstract":"The paper analyzes the tendency to describe the relationship between subjects of the educational process in terms of \u201cdigital generation\u201d, \u201cdigital natives\u201d and \u201cdigital immigrants\u201d. Since the early 2000s the tendency has stably functioned in the Russian educational discourse in spite of its strong criticism. The analysis of the representations of the \u201cdigital generation\u201d demonstrates how the rhetoric of the conflict between students and teachers is implemented in postcolonial and marketing discursive practices. It is shown how these representations are used to justify the change of the education paradigm for the \u201cdigital generation\u201d. The discursive representations of the \u201cdigital generation\u201d are compared with the analysis of social practices in which the digital competence of Internet users is applied. The comparison allows proving that the representations of the \u201cdigital generation\u201d are not grounded in the social practices while these representations impact the inflated self-assessment and low motivation of adolescents to form their digital competence. In conclusion, it is argued that a new education paradigm should be based on research that reveals the level of knowledge and skills required in digital competence in order to face the academic and professional aims of digital communication. Purpose. The article is devoted to the analysis the requirements for changing the education paradigm that are based on the discursive representations of the \u201cdigital generation\u201d. Methodology. Methods of critical discourse analysis allow comparing the discursive representations of the \u201cdigital generation\u201d in the scientific and media educational discourse and social practices revealed in an empirical research on the digital competence of the Russian Internet users. Discursive representations of the relations between students and teacher, reproduced in the scientific and media discourse in 2014-2017 were selected for the discursive analysis by keywords \u201cdigital generation\u201d, \u201cdigital natives\u201d, \u201cimmigrants\u201d. Results. The contradictions between the representations of the \u201cdigital generation\u201d in scientific and media educational discourses and a real level of digital competence of students are revealed. Practical implications. The results of the study prove that a new education paradigm is to be elaborated on the basis of empirical and theoretical research of social practices in which the digital competence is applied by the users for digital communication. ; \u0412 \u0441\u0442\u0430\u0442\u044c\u0435 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0432\u043e\u0434\u0438\u0442\u0441\u044f \u0430\u043d\u0430\u043b\u0438\u0437 https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560; doi:10.37531\/sejaman.v3i2.560","identifier":"https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.37531\/sejaman.v3i2.560","title":"\u201cBATIK\u201d BUSINESS PRODUCTS AMONG BEFORE AND AFTER USING A DIGITAL MARKETING SYSTEM","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this research is to analyze which batik business groups experienced the highest increase in competitiveness and product sales results and how to increase competitiveness and product sales results among before and after using a digital marketing system at one of the batik entrepreneurs. This research uses a comparative approach by analyzing the increase in the highest competitiveness and product sales results and analyze the highest competitiveness and product sales results before and after using the Digital Marketing System. The approach taken by using a questionnaire in accordance with 24 indicator variables. The study was conducted on 4 (four) Batik Business Groups in Kediri City, including Wecono Asri, Dermo, Numansa and Galuh by involving the leaders of the Batik Business Group on the company's competitiveness and product sales before and after using a digital marketing system in March and July 2019. This research technique enabled the researcher to draw conclusions based on the characteristics of respondents regarding increasing company competitiveness and product sales results. The result of this research is Batik Numansa has a higher competitiveness and sales product increase compared to Batik Wecono Asri, Dermo and Galuh. The increase in competitiveness and sales product of Batik Numansa after using a digital marketing system is higher than before using a digital marketing system Keywords : Competitiveness, Sales Result, Batik, Bussiness Product, Digital Marketing System","published_in":"SEIKO : Journal of Management & Business; Vol 3, No 2 (2020): January-Juny; 101-113 ; 2598-831X ; 2598-8301 ; 10.37531\/sejaman.v3i2","year":"2020-04-12","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Ambarwati, Diana; Nadhiroh, Umi","link":"https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560","oa_state":"1","url":"5173dd577b442eca72dbfbbef786b315b508193cd23be052be5ad716edbef4db","relevance":8},{"id":"40fa66cadeef10b205365e2cc48e433193ce0dfad125819ccce4345d311d8f8c","relation":"10.36657\/ihcd.2020.66; \u0130bn Haldun \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 Dergisi; 0; Makale - Ulusal Hakemli Dergi - Ba\u015fka Kurum Yazar\u0131; Jarrar, Y. The changing face of the art market: A Khalduni approach. \u0130bn Haldun \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131 Dergisi, 5(1), 69-82. ss.; 2651-379X; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.36657\/ihcd.2020.66; https:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/20.500.12154\/1069; 5; 1; 69; 82","identifier":"https:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/20.500.12154\/1069; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.36657\/ihcd.2020.66","title":"The changing face of the art market: A Khalduni approach ; Sanat pazar\u0131n\u0131n de\u011fi\u015fen y\u00fcz\u00fc: Halduni yakla\u015f\u0131m","paper_abstract":"The increasingly simulated dimension of reality has resulted in a major shift in the methods of providing services in the art market. As the market\u2019s reliance on technology is transforming the ways through which artworks can be produced, accessed and \u201cconsumed\u201d, both researchers and practitioners have been exploring the nature, scope and potentialities of utilizing virtual reality to help the market expand into new territories. Based on the existing literature, and using the method of textual descriptive analysis, this paper aims to relate the contemporary marketing models of the art market to Ibn Khaldun\u2019s economic thought due to the important conceptual and pioneering role he played in the historic development of fundamental economic concepts that are still relevant in understanding different marketing implications today. It also examines whether the VR market would guarantee a higher level of morality in the way art is presented and protected keeping in mind the threats of cyber-crimes and digital piracy. ; Ger\u00e7ekli\u011fin boyutunun artarak sim\u00fcle edilmesi sanat pazar\u0131na hizmet sa\u011flama y\u00f6ntemlerinde b\u00fcy\u00fck bir de\u011fi\u015fime neden olmaktad\u0131r. Pazar\u0131n teknolojiye ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131l\u0131\u011f\u0131, sanat eserlerinin \u00fcretilmesi, eri\u015filmesi ve \u201ct\u00fcketilmesi\u201d yollar\u0131n\u0131 de\u011fi\u015ftirmektedir. Bu durum hem ara\u015ft\u0131rmac\u0131lar hem de bunu icra edenler piyasan\u0131n yeni b\u00f6lgelere geni\u015flemesine yard\u0131mc\u0131 olmak i\u00e7in sanal ger\u00e7ekli\u011fi kullanman\u0131n do\u011fas\u0131n\u0131, kapsam\u0131n\u0131 ve potansiyellerini ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131yorlar. Mevcut literat\u00fcre dayanarak ve metinsel tan\u0131mlay\u0131c\u0131 analiz y\u00f6ntemini kullanan bu makale sanat pazar\u0131n\u0131n \u00e7a\u011fda\u015f pazarlama modellerini, bug\u00fcn farkl\u0131 pazarlama sonu\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131 anlamada h\u00e2l\u00e2 ge\u00e7erli olan kavramlarda ve temel iktisad\u0131n tarihsel geli\u015fiminde oynad\u0131\u011f\u0131 \u00f6nemli kavramsal ve \u00f6nc\u00fc rol nedeniyle, \u0130bn Haldun'un ekonomi d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcncesi ile ili\u015fkilendirmeyi ama\u00e7lamaktad\u0131r. Ayr\u0131ca VR pazar\u0131n\u0131n, siber su\u00e7lar ve dijital korsanl\u0131k tehditlerini g\u00f6z \u00f6n\u00fcnde bulundurarak, sanat\u0131n sunulma ve korunma bi\u00e7iminde daha y\u00fcksek bir ahlak d\u00fczeyini garanti edip etmeyece\u011fini inceler.","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Virtual Reality; VR Art; Digital Piracy; Sanal Ger\u00e7eklik; VR Sanat; Dijital Korsanl\u0131k","subject":"Virtual Reality; VR Art; Digital Piracy; Sanal Ger\u00e7eklik; VR Sanat; Dijital Korsanl\u0131k","authors":"Jarrar, Yosra","link":"https:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/20.500.12154\/1069","oa_state":"1","url":"40fa66cadeef10b205365e2cc48e433193ce0dfad125819ccce4345d311d8f8c","relevance":7},{"id":"4732532e1ccadcadd52876d06306986a15e7daa1b7568b543e97a945b5a34aed","relation":"1873-2062; 0019-8501; Online 19 February 2020; Industrial marketing management; 10.1016\/j.indmarman.2020.02.004; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1016\/j.indmarman.2020.02.004; https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10652; URN:NBN:fi-fe202003097721","identifier":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10652","title":"Transforming provider-customer relationships in digital servitization : a relational view on digitalization","paper_abstract":"Digitalization is viewed as a source of future competitiveness due to its potential for unlocking new value-creation and revenue-generation opportunities. To profit from digitalization, providers and customers tend to move away from transactional product-centric model to relational service-oriented engagement. This relational transformation is brought about through digital servitization. However, current knowledge about how providers and customers transform their relationship to achieve benefits from digital servitization is lacking. This paper addresses that knowledge gap by applying the relational view theory to a study of four provider-customer relationships engaged in digital servitization. The results provide evidence for four relational components \u2013 complementary digitalization capabilities, relation-specific digital assets, digitally enabled knowledge-sharing routines, and partnership governance \u2013 that enable providers and customers to profit from digital servitization. A key contribution is the development of a relational transformation framework for digital servitization that provides an overview of how the four relational components evolve as the relationship progresses. In doing so, we contribute to the emerging servitization literature by offering key relational insights into the interdependence of activities throughout the transformation phases of provider-customer relationships in digital servitization. ; fi=vertaisarvioitu|en=peerReviewed|","published_in":"","year":"2020-02-19","subject_orig":"digital servitization; relational view; governance; digital transformation; advanced services; business model innovation; enterprises; cooperation (general); value creation; partnership; business models; digitalisation; customers; customer relationship; fi=Johtaminen ja organisaatiot|en=Management and Organization|","subject":"digital servitization; relational view; governance; digital transformation; advanced services; business model innovation; enterprises; cooperation (general); value creation; partnership; business models; digitalisation; customers; customer relationship; fi=Johtaminen ja organisaatiot|en=Management and Organization|","authors":"Kamalaldin, Anmar; Linde, Lina; Sj\u00f6din, David; Parida, Vinit","link":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10652","oa_state":"1","url":"4732532e1ccadcadd52876d06306986a15e7daa1b7568b543e97a945b5a34aed","relevance":6},{"id":"59c01738060e6b35a281d0b2d1085632ac93f0ca2cb699052a70c03532d66ecf","relation":"Shevchuk, S.
